*             EXIT - NORMAL = AT PROGRAM END VIA BRANCH REGISTER 14   *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                   *
*                                                                     *
*                ROUTINES =                                           *
*                                                                     *
*                DATA AREAS =                                         *
*                                                                     *
*                CONTROL BLOCKS = CTCB(CONTROL TERMINAL CONTROL BLOCK)*
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             TABLES =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*             MACROS =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*             CHANGE ACTIVITY =                                       *
*                                                                     *
*             MESSAGES =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             ABEND CODES =                                           *
*                                                                     *
*     *SKV*  PUT IN PLACE SOME SAMPLE CODE.  TO NOT USE THIS          *
*            UNCOMMENT THE BRANCH.                                    *
*  ***                                                                *
*  ***    IT'S WEIRD, BUT THE MAXIMUM USERID LENGTH IS 7 AND THE      *
*  ***    AND THE MAX PASSWORD IS 5.  GO FIGURE...                    *
*  ***                                                                *
*     *SKV*  CHANGED A COMMENT TO REFLECT ACCURACY.                   *
*     *SKV*  COMMENT:  A GOOD PLACE TO PUT IN A CALL TO RACF/SAF OR   *
*            ACF2.                                                    *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                   SKV
         COPY  JRPGLBL                                              SKV
*                                                                   SKV
ENTRYLEN EQU   19                                                   SKV
*                                                                   SKV
JRP123 CSECT
         JRPSAVE REG=12,ID=*,LV=SAVESIZE ;GET SAVE AREA
         USING TERMSAVE,R13              ;MAKE ADDRESSABLE
         L     R11,0(R1)                 ;GET CTCB AREA
         USING J1TWA,R11                 ;MAKE ADDRESSABLE
***********************************************************************
* SECURITY INTERFACE CODE GOES HERE....MUST BE REENTRANT REUSABLE
* DATA AREAS OF CONCERN TO THIS EXIT ARE LISTED BELOW AND DEFINED IN
* CTCB DSECT.
*
*            J1TLUID  8 BYTE LUID FIELD
*            J1DUSER  7 BYTE USERID FIELD
*            J1DPSWD  8 BYTE PASSWORD FIELD
***********************************************************************
*
*   UNCOMMENT THE CODE BELOW TO BYPASS THE SECURITY CHECKING       *SKV
*
*        B     RTNOK                     *** GO APPROVE & EXIT     *SKV
*
*     GO CHANGE INPUT FIELD TO TO REMOVE BIN ZEROS
*
         L     R0,=F'7'                  SET FIELD LENGTH
         LA    R1,J1DUSER                POINT TO THE FIELD TO PROCESS
         BAL   R6,FLDPREPI               GO PREP FIELD
         L     R0,=F'8'                  SET FIELD LENGTH
         LA    R1,J1DPSWD                POINT TO THE FIELD TO PROCESS
         BAL   R6,FLDPREPI               GO PREP FIELD
*
         LA    R1,LOGIDPWT               POINT TO THE START OF TABLE
         LA    R2,LOGIDPWE               POINT TO THE END OF TABLE
UIDLOOP  EQU   *
         CR    R1,R2                     AT END OF TABLE?
         BNL   RTNBUSR                    YES - GO TO BAD USER RTN
         CLC   0(7,R1),J1DUSER           USERID MATCH?
         BNE   UIDLOOPN                   NO = GO CHECK NEXT
         CLC   7(8,R1),J1DPSWD           PASSWORD MATCH?
         BE    RTNOK                      YES - GO APPROVE & EXIT
*                   IF YOU WANT TO CHECK TERMINAL ID, PUT CODE HERE...
         B     RTNBPWD                    NO  - GO EXIT WITH BAD PWD
UIDLOOPN EQU   *
         LA    R1,ENTRYLEN(R1)           POINT TO THE NEXT ENTRY    SKV
         B     UIDLOOP                   GO CHECK NEXT
*
*   BAD USERID
*
RTNBUSR  EQU   *
         L     R15,RC12                  ;SET BAD USER (12)
         XC    J1DPSWD(8),J1DPSWD        ;CLEAR PASSWORD
         B     JRPRTRN                    RETURN TO CALLER
*
*   BAD PASSWORD
*
RTNBPWD  EQU   *
         L     R15,RC8                   ;SET BAD PASSWORD (8)
         XC    J1DPSWD(8),J1DPSWD        ;CLEAR PASSWORD
         B     JRPRTRN                    RETURN TO CALLER
*
*   ALL OK
*
RTNOK    XR    R15,R15                   ;ZERO REG 15
         XC    J1DPSWD(8),J1DPSWD        ;CLEAR PASSWORD
JRPRTRN  DS    0H
         JRPRTRN                         ;RETURN TO JRP122
*
*   GO REMOVE BINARY ZEROS FROM FIELD
*
FLDPREPI EQU   *
         LA    R5,0(R0,R1)               POINT TO THE ENDING POSITION
         B     FLDPREPL                  GO DO THE CHECK AND REPLACE
FLDPREPX EQU   *
         BR    R6                        RETURN TO CALLER
*
FLDPREPL EQU   *
         CR    R1,R5                     ARE WE AT THE LAST POSITION?
         BH    FLDPREPX                   YES - GO EXIT LOOP
         CLI   0(R1),X'00'               BINARY ZERO?
         BNE   FLDPREP1                   NO - GO CONTINUE
         MVI   0(R1),X'40'               CHANGE THE BIN ZERO TO SPACE
FLDPREP1 EQU   *
         LA    R1,1(R1)                  POINT TO THE NEXT POSITION
         BR    R6                        RETURN TO CALLER
*
*    USERID & PASSWORD TABLE
*
*  ENTRY CONSISTS OF (7) USERNAME
*                    (8) PASSWORD
*                    (2) COMMAND AUTHORITY ENTRY(IN DEVELOPMENT)
*                    (2) DEVICE AUTHORITY ENTRY   (IN DEVELOPMENT)
*
LOGIDPWT DC    CL7'SCOTT  ',CL8'SCOTT   ',XL2'FF',XL2'01' 1ST ENTRY SKV
         DC    CL7'SCOTT1 ',CL8'SCOTT   ',XL2'FF',XL2'02' 2ND       SKV
         DC    CL7'SCOTT2 ',CL8'SCOTT   ',XL2'FF',XL2'03' 3RD       SKV
         DC    CL7'SCOTT3 ',CL8'SCOTT   ',XL2'FF',XL2'04' 4TH       SKV
LOGIDPWE DC    CL7'*******',CL8'*****   ',XL2'00',XL2'00' END       SKV
*
*  FORMAT OF AUTHORITY LIST
*
AUTHLST  DS    0F
         DC    XL1'01',XL1'00'   UNSOL/NOUNSOL
         DC    XL1'02',XL1'10'   DISPLAY ONLY
         DC    XL1'03',XL1'20'   RESTRICTED
         DC    XL1'03',XL1'A0'   SUBJECT TO USERMOD EXIT INTERROGATION
         DC    XL1'04',XL1'FF'   ALL COMMANDS
AUTHLSTX DC    XL1'FF',XL1'00'   (END OF ENTRY)
*
*
*  FORMAT OF DEVICE LIST
*     XL1 - SEQUENCE NUMBER
*     XL1 - NUMBER OF ENTRIES
*     CL8 - (OPTIONAL) DEVICE LIST (MIN - 0, MAX 255)
*
DEVLST   DS    0F
         DC    XL1'01',XL1'02',CL8'JPRT1',CL8'JPRT2'
         DC    XL1'02',XL1'01',CL8'JPRT1'
         DC    XL1'03',XL1'01',CL8'JPRT2'
         DC    XL1'04',XL1'02',CL8'JPRT1',CL8'JPRT2'
DEVLSTX  DC    XL1'FF',XL1'00'
*
*
RC0      DC    F'0'      = USERID AND PASSWORD O.K.
RC4      DC    F'4'      = PASSWORD EXPIRED
RC8      DC    F'8'      = INVALID PASSWORD
RC12     DC    F'12'     = INVALID USERID
RC16     DC    F'16'     = USER NOT AUTHORIZED
RC20     DC    F'20'     = UNKNOWN CONDITION.
*
         LTORG
*
** JRP123 SAVE AREA DSECT POINTED TO BY R13
*
TERMSAVE DSECT
         DS    9D                       ;O/S SAVE
SAVESIZE EQU   *-TERMSAVE               ;SIZE OF DYNAMIC AREA
         JRPTMAC                        ;TERMINAL DYNAMIC DSECT
         JRPREGS
         END

JRP200.text:
JRP200 TITLE 'JES2 SSOB SETUP SUPERVISOR'
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
*             MODULE NAME = JRP200                                    *
*                                                                     *
*             DESCRIPTIVE NAME =  SSOB SETUP FOR SUBSYSTEM REQUEST.   *
*                                                                     *
*             AUTHOR = MIKE SCHORTMAN -                               *
*                                                                     *
*             COPYRIGHT = 9/8/82                                      *
*                                                                     *
*              MODIFIED = *
*                                                                     *
*             STATUS =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*             FUNCTION =                                              *
*                BASED ON INFORMATION IN EACH PRINTERS DYNAMIC        *
*                AREA SETS UP SSOB FOR REQUEST TO SUBSYSTEM,          *
*                IF OUTPUT FOR HIM EXISTS CALLS JRP220 TO,            *
*                DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATE SPOOL DATA-SETAND ATTACHES A    *
*                PRINTER SUBTASK. ON PRINT COMPLETION FROM EACH       *
*                PRINTER SUBTASK, DEALLOCATES LINKS TO JRP220         *
*                FOR DYNAMIC DEALLOCATION WITH (KEEP) OR (DELETE)     *
*                DISPOSITION DEPENDING UPON WHICH FLAGS ARE SET.      *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*              NOTES =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                 DEPENDENCIES = JES2 MACROS IN SYS1.HASPSRC,         *
*                            JRPDMAC/JRPSMAC MUST NOT CHANGE
*                              WITHOUT REASSEMBLY.                    *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                 REGISTER CONVENTIONS = STANDARD CONVENTIONS.        *
*                    REGISTERS 1 TO 11 = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                    REGISTER  12      = ADDRESSABILITY TO JRP110     *
*                                        CSECT                        *
*                    REGISTER  13      = SAVE AREA REGISTER AND       *
*                                        ADDRESSABILITY TO GETMAINED  *
*                                        WORK AREA                    *
*                    REGISTERS 14,15   = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                PROCESSOR = ASM                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                MODULE SIZE = 5K BYTES                               *
*                                                                     *
*                ATTRIBUTES = SCHEDULER KEY 0, SUPERVISOR STATE(AC=1) *
*                                                                     *
*             ENTRY POINTS = JRP200 (ONLY ENTRY POINT)                *
*                                                                     *
*                LINKAGE =                                            *
*                   FROM JRP100 AS A SUBTASK                          *
*                                                                     *
*             INPUT = R9 POINTS TO JRPPFLG ,R10 POINTS TO JRP"S       *
*                DYNAMIC PRINTER AREAS,R11 POINTS TO COMMAND OR       *
*                INITIALIZATION INPUT.                                *
*                                                                     *
*             OUTPUT = NONE                                           *
*                                                                     *
*             EXIT - NORMAL = AT PROGRAM END VIA BRANCH REGISTER 14   *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                   *
*                                                                     *
*                ROUTINES = JRP220,JRP210,JRP300(SUBTASK)             *
*                                                                     *
*                DATA AREAS = NONE                                    *
*                                                                     *
*                CONTROL BLOCKS = PWT                                 *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             TABLES = DATA AREA TO BE GETMAINED.  MAPPED BY DSECT    *
*                BEGINNING AT LABEL P2DWA.                            *
*                                                                     *
*             MACROS = JRPSAVE,JRPRTRN,TPUT,WTO,ABEND,STIMER,ATTACH,  *
*                      MODESET,LINK,CALL,JRPDMAC                      *
*                                                                     *
*             CHANGE ACTIVITY = NONE                                  *
*                                                                     *
*             MESSAGES =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                THIS PROGRAM IS THE PROPERTY OF MIKE SCHORTMAN,      *
*                CONN. GENERAL LIFE INS. CO.                          *
*                                                                     *
*             ABEND CODES = U200                                      *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                   SKV
         COPY  JRPGLBL                                              SKV
*                                                                   SKV
JRP200 CSECT
         JRPSAVE REG=12,ID=*,LV=P2DSASIZ
         USING P2DSA,R13
         LM    R9,R11,0(R1)                 GET PARM  (FLAG,PWT,ACB)
*
**       MOVE MODEL DATA TO GOTTEN AREA, ZERO REST.
*
P2WINIT  DS    0H
         LA    R0,P2DWA                     START OF DYNAMIC AREA
         LA    R1,(P2DCLRE-P2DWA)           LENGTH OF DYNAMIC AREA
         LA    R14,P2SWA                    START OF STATIC DATA
         LA    R15,P2SMDL                   LENGTH OF MODEL DATA
         MVCL  R0,R14                       MOVE W/ZERO, RENT,REUS
         ST    R9,P2DJFLG                   SAVE ADDR OF JFLAG
         ST    R10,P2TADDR                  SAVE ADDR OF PWT
         ST    R11,P2DACB                   STORE ACB ADDRESS
         L     R8,P2TADDR                   GET BACK ADDR OF PWT
         USING J1DWA,R5                     ADDRESSABILITY TO DSECT
         B     P2CP2CN1                     BYPASS WAIT CODE
*
**       SCAN PRINTER ENTRIES FOR OUTPUT ELIGIBILITY
*
P2JESWT  DS    0H
         L     R8,P2TADDR                   GET BEGINNING TABLE ADDR.
         STIMER WAIT,BINTVL==F'1000'        WAIT 10 SECS BETWEEN SCANS.
         B     P2CP2CN1                     WE NEED FIRST ENTRY.
P2CP2CAN DS    0H
         LA    R8,12(R8)                    GET NEXT PRINTER ENTRY.
P2CP2CN1 EQU   *
         L     R1,P2DJFLG                   CHECK BOSSES COMM FLAG.
         TM    0(R1),J1DNCLSF               CLOSE  ???
         BO    P2CMJCLS                     YES. NORMAL SHUTDOWN.
         TM    0(R1),J1DICLSF               ICLOSE  ???
         BO    P2CMJCLI                     YES. QUICK SHUTDOWN
         CLC   0(4,R8),=C'PEND'             END OF TABLE  ???
         BE    P2JESWT                      YEH. TAKE A BREAK
         L     R5,8(R8)                     USE R5 FOR DYNAMIC ADDR.
         CLC   J1DJECB(4),ZEROS             IS HE BUSY ???
         BE    P2CKHLT                      NO
         TM    J1DJECB,X'40'                IS HE POSTED
         BNO   P2CP2CAN                     NO. CHECK OTHER PRINTERS
         BAL   R10,P2WDTCH                  GO DETATCH AND UNALLOCATE
         B     P2WDRET(R15)                 SET UP RETURN FROM UNALLOC
P2WDRET  B     P2CKHLT                      RC=0  OK. CHECK FOR HALT.
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DALC          TURN OFF ALLOCATE FLAG
         B     P2CP2CAN                     RC=4  BAD. DONT WORRY -
*                                           JUST CHECK ANOTHER PRINTER.
P2CKHLT  EQU   *
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DALC          TURN OFF ALLOCATE FLAG.
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DRTLM             REACH RETRYLM OR ABEND ??
         BO    P2CP2CAN                     YES. CHECK ANOTHER PRINTER
P2CKPURG EQU   *
         TM    J1DFLAG2,J1DPURGE            IS HE DRAINED ???
         BNO   SD82SSOB                     NO.
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(10),=CL10'DRAINED'  YES. SET DISPLAY
         B     P2CP2CAN                     GO CHECK ANOTHER PRINTER
*
**       SET UP SSOB TO ISSUE IEFSSREQ TO ACCESS A DATA SET
*
SD82SSOB EQU   *
         OI    J1DFLAG2,J1DHDR              SET HEADER ON
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(10),=CL10'INACTIVE' SET INACT DISPLAY
         LA    R1,J1DSSOB                   SSOB AREA
         LA    R7,4(R1)                     BUMP TO ADDRESS STORE
         USING SSOB,R7                      AD¦DRESSABILITY TO SSOB
         ST    R7,0(R1)                     ADDR OF ADDR OF SSOB IN R1
         OI    0(R1),X'80'                  LAST IN LIST
         XC    SSOBEGIN(SSOBHSIZ),SSOBEGIN  CLEAR SSOB HEADER
         LA    R2,SSOBGN                    INITIALIZE SSOB
         XC    0(SSSOSIZE,R2),0(R2)         CLEAR SYSOUT EXTENSION
         MVC   SSOB(WTRSOSIZ),WTRSSOB       INITIALIZE HEADER
         MVC   SSOBFUNC(2),=AL2(SSOBSOUT)   SYSOUT FUNCTION
         ST    R2,SSOBINDV                  ADDRESS OF SYSOUT EXTENSION
         LA    R4,SSSOSIZE                  SYSOUT EXTENSION SIZE
         STH   R4,0(R2)                     SIZE OF SYSOUT EXTENSION
         MVI   SSSOUFLG,X'00'               CLEAR SYSOUT FLAG
         MVC   SSSOPGMN,BLANKS              INITIALIZE WRITER TO BLANKS
         MVI   SSSOFLG2,X'00'               ASK FOR DSNAME
         MVI   SSSOFLG1,X'00'               CLEAR SELECTION BYTE
         OI    SSSOFLG1,SSSODST             DEST IS SELECT CRITERION
         XC    SSSODSN,SSSODSN              CLEAR SSOB DSN
*        XC    J1DDSN(44),J1DDSN            CLEAR PRINTER DSN
         CLI   J1DHCLAS,C' '                CLASS SELECT ??
         BE    NOCLASS                      NO.
         OI    SSSOFLG1,SSSOSCLS            YES. SET CLASS SELECT
NOCLASS  CLI   J1DHFORM,C' '                FORM SELECT ??
         BE    NOFORM                       NO.
         OI    SSSOFLG1,SSSOSFRM            SET FORM SELECT FLAG
NOFORM   MVC   SSSOCLSL(8),J1DHCLAS         MOVE CLASS LIST
         MVC   SSSOFORM(4),J1DHFORM         MOVE FORM #
         MVC   SSSODEST(8),J1DHDEST         MOVE DESTINATION
         BAL   R10,P2WLKREQ                 GO JES REQUEST ROUTINE
         B     REQEND(R15)                  SET UP RETURN BRANCH
REQEND   B     P2DATPRT                     RC=0. WORK RETURNED
         B     P2LKDEL                      RC=4. NO WORK
         B     P2FATALF                     RC=8. SOMETHING WRONG ABEND
*
**       SET UP TO DELETE SSOB CONTROL BLOCK
*
P2LKDEL  DS    0H
         MVI   SSSOFLG2,0                   CLEAR FLAG2
         OI    SSSOFLG2,SSSOCTRL            SET DELETE BIT
         BAL   R10,P2WLKREQ                 GO TO JES REQUEST ROUTINE
         B     DELEND(R15)                  SET UP RETURN BRANCH
DELEND   B     P2CP2CAN                     RC=0. CONTINUE SCAN
         B     P2CP2CAN                     RC=4. CONTINUE SCAN
         B     P2FATALF                     RC=8. SOMETHING WRONG ABEND
*
**       SET UP TO ATTACH PRINTER
*
P2DATPRT DS    0H
         CLC   J1DDSN(44),SSSODSN          SAME DSN??(RETRY OR RESTART)
         BE    P2DHPRTI                    YES. NEED HEADER
         CLC   SSSOJOBI(3),=C'TSU'         TSO OUTPUT??
         BE    P2DHPRTI                    YES. NEED HEADER
         CLC   J1DJOBN(8),SSSOJOBN          SAME JOB NAME
         BNE   P2DHPRTI                     NO. NEED HEADER
         CLC   J1DJOBI(8),SSSOJOBI          SAME JOB NUMBER
         BE    P2DNOHDR                     NO. NEED HEADER
         CLC   SSSOJOBI(3),=C'JOB'          BLANKS
         BE    P2DHPRTI                     NO. NEED HEADER
         CLC   SSSOJOBI(3),=C'STC'          BLANKS
         BNE   P2DNOHDR                     NO. NEED HEADER
P2DHPRTI MVC   J1DJOBI(8),SSSOJOBI             SAVE JOB NUMBER
         MVC   J1DJOBN(8),SSSOJOBN             SAVE JOBNAME
         B     *+8
P2DNOHDR NI    J1DFLAG2,255-J1DHDR          YES. NO HEADER
         MVC   J1DBFNUM(8),J1DJOBI             "             "
         MVC   J1DHJNM(8),J1DJOBI              "             "
         MVC   J1DBEGJ(8),J1DJOBI
         MVC   J1DBFNME(8),J1DJOBN             "          "
         MVC   J1DHNME(8),J1DJOBN              "          "
         MVC   J1DBEGJN(8),J1DJOBN
         MVC   J1DDSN(44),SSSODSN               SAVE DSNAME
         MVI   J1DPRN1,C'('                 CLEAN UP DISPLAY
         MVI   J1DPRN2,C')'                 "              "
         BAL   R10,P2WALCG                  GO TO ALLOC ROUTINE
         B     DYNRET(R15)                  SET UP RETURN BRANCH
DYNRET   B     DYNOK                        RC=0. ALLOC OK
         B     P2CP2CAN                     RC=4. DONT WORRY KEEP GOING
DYNOK    OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DALC              SET ALLOCATED FLAG
         MVC   J1DHSTAT,=CL10'ACTIVE'       ACTIVE FOR DISPLAY
         MVC   J1DACB,P2DACB                STORE ACB ADDRESS
         ST    R5,P2DATACH                  DYNAMIC ADDR IN CALL LIST
         LA    R6,J1DJECB                   GET ECB ADDRESS
         MVC   1(3,R6),=C'XXX'              SET TO BUSY
         ATTACH EP=JRP300,SZERO=YES,MF=(E,P2DATACH),ECB=(R6)
         ST    R1,J1DTCB                    STORE TCB ADDRESS
*
**       SAVE PSO ADDRESS
*
P2DSVPSO EQU   *
         L     R7,J1DSSOB                   GET SSOB ADDRESS
         USING SSOB,R7                      SSOB ADDRESSABILITY
         ICM   R7,15,SSOBSSIB               SSIB ADDRESS FROM SSOB
         USING SSIB,R7                      SSIB ADDRESSABILITY
         MODESET KEY=ZERO                   KEY ZERO FOR CONTROL BLOCKS
         ICM   R7,15,SSIBSUSE               SJB ADDRESS FROM SSIB
         USING SJBDSECT,R7                  SJB ADDRESSABILITY
         ICM   R2,15,SJBPSOP                PSO ADDRESS FROM SJB
         BZ    P2CP2CAN                     NO PSO ADDRESS
         ST    R2,J1DPSOS                   PSO ADDRESS IN PWE
         XC    SJBPSOP(4),SJBPSOP           ZERO PSO POINTER IN SJB
         MODESET KEY=NZERO                  KEY 8
         DROP  R7                           DROP ADDRESSABILITY
         B     P2CP2CAN                     CHECK FOR MORE WORK
*
**       DETATCH PRINTER SUBTASK
*
P2WDTCH  DS    0H
         STATUS STOP,TCB=J1DTCB             STOP SUBTASK
         DETACH J1DTCB                      DETATCH SUBTASK
         CLC   J1DHSTAT+5(4),=C'U300'       DID HE USER ABEND
         BE    P2WALC                       YES
         CLC   J1DJECB+1(3),=X'000000'      DID HE SYSTEM ABEND
         BE    P2WALC                       NO
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DRTLM             SET RETRY LIMIT FLAG
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP             REQUE THIS DATA-SET
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(6),=C'ABENDS'       TELL SYSTEM ABEND
         MVI   J1DJECB+3,X'0C'              MAKE VALID PACKED FIELD
         UNPK  P2DHOLD(5),J1DJECB+1(3) UNPACK ABEND CODE
         LA    R14,P2DHOLD                  FROM TRANSLATE
         LA    R15,4                        TRANSLATE LENGTH
         LA    R6,P2STBL1 TRANSLATE TABLE
         EX    R15,P2STR
         MVC   J1DHSTAT+6(3),P2DHOLD
         MVI   J1DHSTAT+9,C' '
         MVC   J1DBEGJ(8),BLANKS             CLEAR JONNUM FOR HEADER
*
**       FIND SJB AND PUT PSO FROM PWE BACK IN THERE
*
P2WALC   DS    0H
         MVC   J1DJECB(4),ZEROS
         ICM   R7,15,J1DSSOB                SSOB ADDRESS FROM PWA
         BZ    P2WALCG                      IF ZEROS THEN UNALOC
         USING SSOB,R7                      ADDRESS IT
         ICM   R7,15,SSOBSSIB               SSIB ADDRESS FROM SSOB
         USING SSIB,R7                      ADDRESS IT
         MODESET KEY=ZERO                   KEY 0,JES CONTROL BLOCKS
         ICM   R7,15,SSIBSUSE               SJB ADDRESS FROM SSIB
         USING SJBDSECT,R7                  ADDRESS IT
         MVC   SJBPSOP(4),J1DPSOS           RESTORE PSO ADDRESS
         MODESET KEY=NZERO                  KEY 8
         DROP  R7                           DROP ADDRESSABILITY
*
**       LINK TO DYNAMIC ALLOCATE/UNALLOCATE MODULE
*
P2WALCG  LINK  EP=JRP220,PARAM=((R5)),MF=(E,P2DLINK)
         BR    R10
*
**       LINK TO SUBSYSTEM REQUEST MODULE
*
P2WLKREQ LINK  EP=JRP210,PARAM=((R5)),MF=(E,P2DLINK)
         BR    R10
*
**       CLOSE WAS ISSUED, CLOSE IN PROGRESS
*
P2CMJCLS DS    0H
         L     R8,P2TADDR                   GET TOP OF PWT
         LA    R6,*+4                       SET UP RETURN BRANCH
         CLC   0(4,R8),=C'PEND'             END OF TABLE ??
         BE    P2CLSET                      YES.
         L     R5,8(R8)                     NO. GET HIS DYNAMIC AREA
         OI    J1DFLAG2,J1DPURGE            SET PURGE FLAG
         LA    R8,12(R8)                    BUMP TO NEXT PRINTER ENTRY
         BR    R6                           LOOP BACK
*
**       ICLOSE WAS ISSUED, CLOSE IN PROGRESS
*
P2CMJCLI DS    0H
         L     R8,P2TADDR                   GET TOP OF TABLE
         LA    R6,*+4                       SET UP RETURN BRANCH
         CLC   0(4,R8),=C'PEND'             END OF TABLE
         BE    P2CLSET                      YES.
         L     R5,8(R8)                     NO. GET HIS DYNAMIC AREA
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DSTOP             SET HIS STOP FLAG
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP             KEEP DS.
         LA    R8,12(R8)                    BUMP TO NEXT ENTRY
         BR    R6                           LOOP BACK
P2CLSET  L     R8,P2TADDR                   GET TOP OF TABLE
P2CLSLP  L     R5,8(R8)                     GET DYNAMIC AREA ADDRESS
         CLC   J1DJECB(4),ZEROS             IS HE BUSY
         BE    P2ONECLS                     YES.
*        TM    J1DJECB,X'40'                IS HE POSTED
*        BE    P2CONT                       YES.
         LA    R1,J1DJECB                   GET ECB ADDRESS
         WAIT  ECB=(R1)                     WAIT TILL DONE
P2CONT   BAL   R10,P2WDTCH                  GO DETATCH AND DEALLOCATE
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DALC          TURN OFF ALLOCATE FLAG
         L    R7,J1DSSOB                    GET SSOB ADDR
         USING SSOB,R7                      SET UP ADDRESSABILITY
         MVI  SSSOFLG2,0                    CLEAR SSOB FLAG 2
         OI   SSSOFLG2,SSSOCTRL             SET SSOB DELETE FLAG
         DROP R7                            DROP ADDRESSABILITY
         BAL  R10,P2WLKREQ                  GO ISSUE DELETE REQUEST
P2ONECLS LA   R8,12(R8)                     BUMP TO NEXT ENTRY
         CLC  0(4,R8),=C'PEND'              END OF TABLE
         BNE  P2CLSLP                       NO.
JRPRTRN DS    0H
         XR    R15,R15                      ZERO REG 15
         JRPRTRN                            RETURN
P2FATALF DS    0H
         WTO   'JRPE200   JRP210 FAILURE..ABENDING'
         ABEND  200,DUMP
J2SYN    EQU    *
TSGEOD   EQU    *
         TITLE 'STATIC STORAGE'
P2SWA    DS    0D
**********************************************************************
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
**********************************************************************
         PUSH  PRINT
         PRINT NOGEN
P2SATACH CALL  ,J2SYN,MF=L
P2SLINK  LINK  EP=JRP220,SF=L
P2SMDL   EQU   *-P2SWA
         POP   PRINT
***********************************************************************
*  EVERYTHING FROM HERE ON IS NOT COPIED TO DYNAMIC AREA              *
***********************************************************************
         DS    0F
BLANKS   DC    CL16' '
ZEROS    DC    4X'00'
P2STR    TR    0(*-*,R14),0(R6)
P2STBL1  DC    256X'F0'
         ORG   P2STBL1+X'F0'
         DC    X'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'
         ORG
WTRSSOB  DS    0F
WJ2SOBID DC    CL4'SSOB'
WJ2SOBSZ DC    AL2(SSOBHSIZ)
WJ2SOBFN DC    AL2(SSOBSOUT)
WTRSOSIZ EQU   *-WTRSSOB
         SPACE 2
         LTORG
         IEZDEB  LIST=YES
JRP200 CSECT
         $SJB
         IEFJSSOB (SO)
         IEFJSSIB ,                SSIB MAPPING MACRO
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC - GOTTEN AREA'
P2DSA    DSECT
         DS    9D                  O/S SAVE
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
P2DWA    DS    0D
P2DATACH CALL   ,J2SYN,MF=L
P2DLINK  LINK  EP=JRP220,SF=L
***********************************************************************
*  EVERYTHING FROM HERE ON IS SET TO LOW VALUES AT INIT TIME          *
***********************************************************************
         DS    0F                  SVC 99 BUILD AREA
P2DACB   DS    F
P2TADDR  DS    F
P2DJFLG  DS    F
P2DHOLD  DS    CL6
P2DCLRE  EQU   *                   END OF DYNAMIC AREA
P2DSASIZ EQU   *-P2DWA             SIZE OF DYNAMIC AREA
         TITLE 'MISC EQUATES AND DSECTS'
         JRPREGS
         PUSH  PRINT
         JRPDMAC
         PRINT NOGEN               SAVE A LITTLE PAPER
         POP   PRINT
         END

JRP210.text:
JRP210 TITLE 'SUBSYSTEM INTERFACE - SSOB PRESENTATION'
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
*             MODULE NAME = JRP210                                    *
*                                                                     *
*             DESCRIPTIVE NAME =  ISSUE SUBSYSTEM REQUEST BASED       *
*                ON SSOB SETUP FROM JRP200                            *
*                                                                     *
*             AUTHOR = MIKE SCHORTMAN -                               *
*                                                                     *
*             COPYRIGHT = 9/8/82                                      *
*                                                                     *
*              MODIFIED = *
*                                                                     *
*             STATUS =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*             FUNCTION =                                              *
*                ISSUE IEFSSREQ SUBSYSTEM REQUEST MACRO. SELECT       *
*                OUTPUT FROM JES2 SPOOL DATASET.                      *
*                                                                     *
*              NOTES =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                 DEPENDENCIES = JES2 MAINTENANCE LEVEL MUST NOT      *
*                              BE CHANGED WITHOUT REASSEMBLY.         *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                 REGISTER CONVENTIONS = STANDARD CONVENTIONS.        *
*                    REGISTERS 1 TO 11 = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                    REGISTER  12      = ADDRESSABILITY TO JRP110     *
*                                        CSECT                        *
*                    REGISTER  13      = SAVE AREA REGISTER AND       *
*                                        ADDRESSABILITY TO GETMAINED  *
*                                        WORK AREA                    *
*                    REGISTERS 14,15   = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                PROCESSOR = ASM                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                MODULE SIZE = 5K BYTES                               *
*                                                                     *
*                ATTRIBUTES = SCHEDULER KEY 0, SUPERVISOR STATE(AC=1) *
*                                                                     *
*             ENTRY POINTS = JRP210 (ONLY ENTRY POINT)                *
*                                                                     *
*                LINKAGE =                                            *
*                   FROM JRP200 AS A SUBROUTINE                       *
*                                                                     *
*             INPUT =                                                 *
*                                                                     *
*             OUTPUT = NONE                                           *
*                                                                     *
*             EXIT - NORMAL = AT PROGRAM END VIA BRANCH REGISTER 14   *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                   *
*                                                                     *
*                ROUTINES = NONE                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                DATA AREAS = NONE                                    *
*                                                                     *
*                CONTROL BLOCKS = PWT                                 *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             TABLES = DATA AREA TO BE GETMAINED.  MAPPED BY DSECT    *
*                BEGINNING AT LABEL P2DWA.                            *
*                                                                     *
*             MACROS = JRPSAVE,JRPRTRN,IEFSSREQ,MODESET               *
*                                                                     *
*             CHANGE ACTIVITY = NONE                                  *
*                                                                     *
*             MESSAGES =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                THIS PROGRAM IS THE PROPERTY OF MIKE SCHORTMAN       *
*                CONN. MUTUAL LIFE INS. CO.                           *
*                                                                     *
*             ABEND CODES = NONE                                      *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                   SKV
         COPY  JRPGLBL                                              SKV
*                                                                   SKV
JRP210 CSECT
         JRPSAVE REG=12,ID=*
         USING P2DSA,R13
         L     R5,0(R1)        GET PARM  (PWT)
*
*
**       MOVE MODEL DATA TO GOTTEN AREA, ZERO REST.
*
         USING   J1DWA,R5
         L       R7,J1DSSOB
         USING   SSOB,R7
         MODESET MODE=SUP
         LA    R1,J1DSSOB
         IEFSSREQ                  ASK HASP FOR WORK
         LR    R11,R15
         MODESET MODE=PROB
         LTR   R11,R11             TEST RETURN CODE
         BZ    SD82RTRN            NORMAL RETURN
         LA    R15,8               NO SUP GOES TO P2FATALF
         B     P2DRETRN                               FOR TESTING
SD82RTRN EQU   *
         C     R11,SSOBRETN
         BNE   P2DBRTN
         XR      R15,R15
         BE    P2DRETRN            NO CHECK OTHER PRINTERS
P2DBRTN  LA    R15,4 SUP           GOES TO P2CMSCAN
P2DRETRN DS   0H                   RC=0 CONTINUES THROUGH SUP CODE
         JRPRTRN
         TITLE 'STATIC STORAGE'
J2SYN    EQU   *
P2GEOD   EQU   *
P2SWA    DS    0D
**********************************************************************
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
**********************************************************************
         PUSH  PRINT
         PRINT NOGEN
         POP   PRINT
***********************************************************************
*  EVERYTHING FROM HERE ON IS NOT COPIED TO DYNAMIC AREA              *
***********************************************************************
         DS    0F
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC - GOTTEN AREA'
P2DSA    DSECT
         DS    9D                  O/S SAVE
         TITLE 'MISC EQUATES AND DSECTS'
         JRPREGS
         PUSH  PRINT
*        PRINT NOGEN               SAVE A LITTLE PAPER
*        DCBD  DSORG=PS
         IEZDEB
         POP   PRINT
         CVT     DSECT=YES          CVT
*        IHAPSA  DSECT=YES          PSA
*        IKJTCB  DSECT=YES          TCB
*        $SJB
         IEFJSSOB (SO)
         IEFJESCT
         IEFJSSIB ,                SSIB MAPPING MACRO
         JRPDMAC
         END

JRP220.text:
JRP220 TITLE 'JRP DYNAMIC ALLOCATE/UNALLOCATE ROUTINE'
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
*             MODULE NAME = JRP220                                    *
*                                                                     *
*             DESCRIPTIVE NAME =  ALLOCATE/DEALLOCATE ROUTINE         *
*                FOR JRP     328X PRINTER"S                           *
*                                                                     *
*             AUTHOR = MIKE SCHORTMAN -                               *
*                                                                     *
*             COPYRIGHT = 9/8/82                                      *
*                                                                     *
*              MODIFIED =                                             *
*                                                                     *
*             STATUS =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             FUNCTION =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                OPERATION =                                          *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*              NOTES =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                 DEPENDENCIES =                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                 REGISTER CONVENTIONS = STANDARD CONVENTIONS.        *
*                    REGISTERS 1 TO 11 = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                    REGISTER  12      = ADDRESSABILITY TO JRP220     *
*                                        CSECT                        *
*                    REGISTER  13      = SAVE AREA REGISTER AND       *
*                                        ADDRESSABILITY TO GETMAINED  *
*                                        WORK AREA                    *
*                    REGISTERS 14,15   = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                PROCESSOR = ASM                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                MODULE SIZE = -- BYTES                               *
*                                                                     *
*                ATTRIBUTES = SCHEDULER KEY 8, PROBLEM STATE          *
*                   PROBLEM PROGRAM STATE                             *
*                                                                     *
*             ENTRY POINTS = JRP220 (ONLY ENTRY POINT)                *
*                                                                     *
*                LINKAGE =                                            *
*                   FROM JRP200 AS A SUBROUTINE                       *
*                                                                     *
*             INPUT = DYNAMIC AREA ADDRESS FOR ALLOCATE OR DEALLOCATE *
*                                                                     *
*             OUTPUT = NONE                                           *
*                                                                     *
*             EXIT - NORMAL = AT PROGRAM END VIA BRANCH REGISTER 14   *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                   *
*                                                                     *
*                ROUTINES = NONE                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                DATA AREAS = NONE                                    *
*                                                                     *
*                CONTROL BLOCKS = PWT                                 *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             TABLES = DATA AREA TO BE GETMAINED.  MAPPED BY DSECT    *
*                BEGINNING AT LABEL MSDWA.                            *
*                                                                     *
*             MACROS = JRPSAVE,JRPRTRN,TPUT,                          *
*                                                                     *
*             CHANGE ACTIVITY = NONE                                  *
*                                                                     *
*             MESSAGES =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                THIS PROGRAM IS THE PROPERTY OF MIKE SCHORTMAN       *
*                CONN. MUTUAL LIFE INS. CO..                          *
*                                                                     *
*             ABEND CODES = U220                                      *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                   SKV
         COPY  JRPGLBL                                              SKV
*                                                                   SKV
JRP220 CSECT
         JRPSAVE REG=12,ID=*
         L     R11,0(R1)            GETMAINED AREA
         USING J1DWA,R11
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DALC
         BO    J1DUNALC
***                                                                 ***
*        INITIALIZE DYNAMIC ALLOCATION PARAMETER AREA                 *
**                                                                  ***
J1DINDYN DS    0H
         LA    R8,J1DS99
         LR    R1,R8                 ADDRESS OF PARALLOC
         LA    R8,4(R8)            INCREMENT TO DAL REQUEST BLOCK
         ST    R8,0(R1)            SET UP RB PTR ADDR.
         OI    0(R1),S99RBPND
         USING S99RB,R8
         XC    S99RB(DYNRBSIZ),S99RB
         MVI   S99RBLN,DYNRBSIZ    SIZE OF RB
         LA    R3,DYNRBSIZ(R8)     INCREMENT TO FIRST TEXT POINTER
         USING DYNTXTPT,R3
         LA    R4,TXTPTSIZ(R3)     INCREMENT TO TEXT UNITS
         USING S99TUNIT,R4
*        DSNAME TEXT UNIT
         ST    R4,DSNTXTPT         SET UP ADDR OF FIRST TEXT UNIT
         XC    S99TUKEY(DYNEND-DYNTXTND),S99TUKEY ZERO TEXT UNITS
         MVI   S99TUKEY+1,DALDSNAM DSNAME IS SUPPLIED TO SVC99
         MVI   S99TUNUM+1,X'01'    NUMBER OF ENTRIES
         MVI   S99TULNG+1,44       SIZE OF DSNAME
         LA    R4,L'DSNTXTUT(R4)   INCREMENT TO SSREQ TEXT UNIT
*        SSREQ TEXT UNIT
         ST    R4,SSRTXTPT         ADDRESS OF SSREQ TEXT UNIT
         MVI   S99TUKEY+1,DALSSREQ THIS IS A REQUEST FOR SUBSYSTEM
         MVI   S99TULNG+1,4        LENGTH OF PARM FIELD
         L     R2,PSATNEW-PSA      TCB NEW
         L     R2,TCBJSCB-TCB(R2)  JSCB
         L     R2,JSCBSSIB-IEZJSCB(R2) SSIB
         USING SSIB,R2
         MVC   S99TUPAR(4),SSIBSSNM PRIMARY SUBSYSTEM NAME
         DROP  R2                  UNUSE SSIB
         MVI   S99TUNUM+1,X'01'    NUMBER OF REQUESTS
         LA    R4,L'SSRTXTUT(R4)   INCREMENT TO DDN TEXT UNIT
*        DDNAME RETURN TEXT UNIT
         ST    R4,DDNTXTPT         ADDR OF DDNAME RETURNED TEXT UNIT
         MVI   DDNTXTPT,S99TUPLN   LAST TEXT UNIT PTR. IN LIST
         MVI   S99TUKEY+1,DALRTDDN RETURN DDNAME TO ME
         MVI   S99TUNUM+1,X'01'    NUMBER OF ENTRIES
         MVI   S99TULNG+1,8        LENGTH OF PARM FIELD
         MVC   S99TUPAR(8),=8CL1' ' INITIALIZE TO BLANKS
         LA    R4,L'DDNTXTUT(R4)   INCREMENT TO DDNAME UNALLOC TEXT
*        DDNAME UNALLOCATE TEXT UNIT
         ST    R4,UDNTXTPT         SAVE UNALLOC TEXT ADDRESS
         MVI   S99TUKEY+1,DUNDDNAM USE DDNAME TO UNALLOCATE
         MVI   S99TUNUM+1,X'01'    NUMBER OF ENTRIES
         MVI   S99TULNG+1,8        LENGTH OF PARM FIELD
         LA    R4,L'UDNTXTUT(R4)   INCREMENT TO OVERRIDE TEXT
*        DISPOSITION OVERRIDE TEXT UNIT
         ST    R4,UORTXTPT         SAVE ADDRESS OF OVERRIDE TEXT
         MVI   UORTXTPT,S99TUPLN   LAST TEXT UNIT PTR. IN LIST
         MVI   S99TUKEY+1,DUNOVDSP OVERRIDE DISPOSITION KEY
         MVI   S99TULNG+1,1        LENGTH OF PARM FIELD
         MVI   S99TUNUM+1,X'01'    NUMBER OF ENTRIES
         DROP  R4
***                                                                 ***
*    SET UP TO DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATE DATA SET                          *
***                                                                 ***
         MVI   S99VERB,S99VRBAL    ALLOCATION VERB
         LA    R3,DISPDSN(R8)      ADDR. DSNAME TEXT UNIT
         ST    R3,S99TXTPP         STORE ADDR OF TEXT UNIT PTRS
         L     R4,0(,R3)           ADDR OF FIRST TEXT UNIT
         MVC   6(44,R4),J1DDSN     GET DATA SET NAME FROM SSOB
         BAL   R10,DYNAL           DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATE DATA SET
         L     R3,S99TXTPP         ADDRESS OF TEXT UNITS
         L     R4,DDNTXTPT-DYNTXTPT(R3) ADDRESS OF DDNAME TEXT UNIT
         MVC   J1DDNM(8),6(R4) PUT DDNAME IN DCB
         ST    R3,J1DST3
         ST    R8,J1DST8
         XR    R15,R15
         B     JRPRTRN
*****************
J1DUNALC DS    0H
         L     R8,J1DST8
         L     R3,J1DST3
         USING S99RB,R8
         MVI   S99VERB,S99VRBUN    UNALLOCATION VERB
         LA    R3,DISPUAL(R8)      INCREMENT TO UNAL
         ST    R3,S99TXTPP         STORE ADDR. OF TEXT UNIT PTRS.
         L     R3,0(R3)            ADDRESS OF DDNAME FOR UNALLOCATE
         L     R4,DISPDDN(R8)      ADDRESS OF DDNAME UNIT
         MVC   6(8,R3),6(R4)       PUT DDNAME INTO TEXT FOR UNALLOC
         L     R4,DISPOVR(R8)      ADDRESS OF OVERIDE UNIT
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP    IS INPUT TO BE KEPT
         BO    KEEPDS              YES
         MVI   6(R4),X'04'         DELETE DATA SET
         B     DYNUN               UNALLOCATE WITH DELETE DISP
KEEPDS   MVI   6(R4),X'08'         KEEP DATA SET
DYNUN    BAL   R10,DYNAL           DYNAMICALLY UNALLOCATE DATA SET
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DKEEP RESET KEEP OPTION
         MVC   J1DHNME(18),=18CL1' ' RESET STATUS FIELD
         XR    R15,R15
JRPRTRN JRPRTRN
DYNAL    DS    0H
         LA    R1,J1DS99
         SVC   99
         LTR   R15,R15
         BZR   R10
         L     R10,S99ERROR-S99RB(R8)
         MVC   J1DWERR1(25),=C'BAD DYNALLOC RETURN CODE '
         TITLE 'F A T A L  E R R O R  M E S S A G E S'
P2FATALF DS    0H
         CVD   R15,J1DWORK         CONVERT CALLERS RETURN CODE IN R15
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)     SAVE MY JRPREGS
         UNPK  J1DWERR2,J1DWORK+6(2) 999 MAX RC SUPPORTED
         OI    J1DWERR2+L'J1DWERR2-1,C'0' MAKE PRINTABLE
         LA    R1,J1DWERR          GET MF=L FORM OF WTO
         SVC   35                  ISSUE WTO
         LA     R15,4
         ABEND  220,DUMP
         B      JRPRTRN
J2SYN    EQU    *
P2GEOD   EQU    *
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC ALLOCATION PARAMETER LIST DSECT'
         IEFZB4D0
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC ALLOCATION TEXT UNIT KEYS'
         IEFZB4D2
         TITLE 'SUBSYSTEM OPTION BLOCK - ACCESS SYSOUT DATA SETS'
         IEFJSSOB (SO)
         TITLE 'JOB ENTRY SUBSYSTEM COMMUNICATIONS TABLE'
         IEFJESCT
         TITLE 'SUBSYSTEM IDENTIFICATION BLOCK'
         IEFJSSIB ,                SSIB MAPPING MACRO
         TITLE 'WRITER DYNAMIC ALLOCATION WORK AREA'
DYNTXTPT DSECT
DSNTXTPT DS    F                   POINTER TO DSNAME TEXT UNIT
SSRTXTPT DS    F                   PTR. TO SUBSYSTEM REQUEST TEXT UNIT
DDNTXTPT DS    F                   PTR TO DDNAME RETURNED TEXT UNIT
UDNTXTPT DS    F                   DDNAME TEXT PTR. FOR UNALLOCATE
UORTXTPT DS    F                   OVERRIDE TEXT PTR. FOR UNALLOCATE
DYNTXTND EQU   *                   END OF TEXT POINTERS
DSNTXTUT DS    CL50                DSNAME TEXT UNIT
SSRTXTUT DS    CL10                SUBSYSTEM REQUEST TEXT UNIT
DDNTXTUT DS    CL14                DDNAME RETURNED  TEXT UNIT
UDNTXTUT DS    CL14                UNALLOCATE DDNAME TEXT UNIT
UORTXTUT DS    CL7                 OVERRIDE DISPOSITION FOR UNALLOCATE
DYNEND   EQU   *
TXTPTSIZ EQU   DYNTXTND-DYNTXTPT   SIZE OF TEXT UNIT POINTERS
DYNRBSIZ EQU   S99RBEND-S99RB      SIZE OF DYN ALLOC REQUEST BLOCK
DYN      EQU   TXTPTSIZ+DYNRBSIZ+(DYNEND-DSNTXTUT)+L'S99RBPTR
DISPDDN  EQU   DYNRBSIZ+DDNTXTPT-DYNTXTPT    ADDR. OF DDNAME IN DYN LST
DISPOVR  EQU   DYNRBSIZ+UORTXTPT-DYNTXTPT    ADDR. OVRIDE IN DYN LST
DISPUAL  EQU   DYNRBSIZ+UDNTXTPT-DYNTXTPT    ADDR. UNAL IN DYN LST
DISPDSN  EQU   DYNRBSIZ+DSNTXTPT-DYNTXTPT    ADDR. DSNAME IN DYN LIST
         TITLE 'MISC EQUATES AND DSECTS'
         JRPREGS
         PUSH  PRINT
         POP   PRINT
         CVT     DSECT=YES          CVT
         IHAPSA  DSECT=YES          PSA
         IKJTCB  DSECT=YES          TCB
         IEZJSCB                   JSCB
         JRPDMAC
         END

JRP300.text:
JRP300 TITLE '328X PRINTER SUBTASK'
         TITLE 'START-UP'
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
*             MODULE NAME = JRP300                                    *
*                                                                     *
*             DESCRIPTIVE NAME =  PRINTER SUBTASK ROUTINE  FOR JRP    *
*                            328X PRINTER"S                           *
*                                                                     *
*             AUTHOR = MIKE SCHORTMAN -                               *
*                                                                     *
*             COPYRIGHT = 1/8/84                                      *
*                                                                     *
*              MODIFIED =                                             *
*                                                                     *
*             STATUS =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             FUNCTION =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                OPERATION =                                          *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*              NOTES =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                 DEPENDENCIES =                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                 REGISTER CONVENTIONS = STANDARD CONVENTIONS.        *
*                    REGISTERS 1 TO 11 = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                    REGISTER  12      = ADDRESSABILITY TO JRP300     *
*                                        CSECT                        *
*                    REGISTER  13      = SAVE AREA REGISTER AND       *
*                                        ADDRESSABILITY TO GETMAINED  *
*                                        WORK AREA                    *
*                    REGISTERS 14,15   = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                PROCESSOR = ASM                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                MODULE SIZE = -- BYTES                               *
*                                                                     *
*                ATTRIBUTES = SCHEDULER KEY 8, PROBLEM STATE          *
*                   PROBLEM PROGRAM STATE                             *
*                                                                     *
*             ENTRY POINTS = JRP---- (ONLY ENTRY POINT)               *
*                                                                     *
*                LINKAGE =                                            *
*                   FROM JRP---- AS A SUBROUTINE                      *
*                                                                     *
*             INPUT = R9 POINTS TO JRPPFLG ,R10 POINTS TO JRP"S       *
*                DYNAMIC PRINTER AREAS,R11 POINTS TO COMMAND OR       *
*                INITIALIZATION INPUT.                                *
*                                                                     *
*             OUTPUT = NONE                                           *
*                                                                     *
*             EXIT - NORMAL = AT PROGRAM END VIA BRANCH REGISTER 14   *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                   *
*                                                                     *
*                ROUTINES = IKJPARS, DAIRFAIL, GNRLFAIL               *
*                                                                     *
*                DATA AREAS = NONE                                    *
*                                                                     *
*                CONTROL BLOCKS = PWT                                 *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             TABLES = DATA AREA TO BE GETMAINED.  MAPPED BY DSECT    *
*                BEGINNING AT LABEL P3DWA.                            *
*                                                                     *
*             MACROS = JRPSAVE,JRPRTRN,TPUT,                          *
*                                                                     *
*             CHANGE ACTIVITY = NONE                                  *
*                                                                     *
*             MESSAGES =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                THIS PROGRAM IS THE PROPERTY OF MIKE SCHORTMAN,      *
*                CONN. MUTUAL LIFE INS. CO.                           *
*                                                                     *
*             ABEND CODES = U300                                      *
*                                                                     *
*        *SKV*  CHANGED TRANSLATE TABLE SO IT WOULD WORK PROPERLY     *
*        *SKV*  CHANGED BANNER PAGE PROCESSING.                       *
*        *SKV*  CHANGED TO INCLUDE DISPLAYING AN END OF PRINT         *
*               MESSAGE.                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                   SKV
         COPY  JRPGLBL                                              SKV
*                                                                   SKV
JRP300 CSECT
*        JRPIMAC                                                   *SKV
         JRPSAVE REG=12,ID=*,LV=P3DSASIZ
         USING P3DSA,R13
         L     R11,0(R1)            GETMAINED AREA
         USING J1DWA,R11
         MODESET KEY=ZERO,MODE=SUP
         LA    R0,41
         SVC   95
         MODESET KEY=NZERO,MODE=PROB
*
**       MOVE MODEL DATA TO GOTTEN AREA, ZERO REST.
*
P3WINIT  DS    0H
         LA    R0,P3DWA          START OF DYNAMIC AREA
         LA    R1,(P3DCLRE-P3DWA) LENGTH OF DYNAMIC AREA
         LA    R14,P3SWA           START OF STATIC DATA
         LA    R15,P3SMDL          LENGTH OF MODEL DATA
         MVCL  R0,R14              MOVE W/ZERO TO BE RENT,REUS
         ZAP   P3DIOER,=P'0'
         NI    J1DFLAG2,255-J1DFLUSH
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DRTLM
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DKEEP
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DBEGIN
         MVC   P3DLUID(8),J1DLUID
         MVC   P3DLGMD(8),J1DLGMD
         MVC   J1DBROK1(2),=C'00'
         MVC   J1DBROK2(2),=C'00'
         MVC   J1DBROK3(8),=C'00000000'
P3GPRST  DS    0H
         XR    R2,R2               CLEAR R2 FOR COUNTER
         MVI   J1DOPENX,X'80'      ONLY ONE IN LIST
         LA    R6,P3DBUFR
         CLI   J1DHSCS,C'Y'
         BE    P382NNEW
         MVC   0(2,R6),=X'F5C8'
         LA    R6,2(R6)
P382NNEW DS    0H
         ST    R6,J1DBFPTR
***                                                                 ***
*   INITIALIZE INPUT DCB                                              *
***                                                                 ***
         MVC   DCBDDNAM-IHADCB+P3DDCBIS(8),J1DDNM PUT DDNAME IN DCB
         LA    R15,P3DDCBI        GET INPUT DCB ADDR
         OPEN  ((R15),INPUT),MF=(E,J1DOPENX)
*SKV     TM    J1DFLAG2,J1DHDR
*SKV     BNO   P3GNTPUT
         MVC   J1DOPERM(4),=C'I400'
         MVC   J1DBFR+18(9),=C'BEGINNING'                          *SKV
P3UNSOL  DS    0H
         LA    R0,L'J1DBFR         LENGTH
         LA    R1,J1DBFR           ADDR OF P3G
         STM   R0,R1,J1DMSGLN
         ST    R11,P3DATACH
         LINK   EP=JRP310,MF=(E,P3DATACH)
TPUT     LA    R0,L'J1DBFR         LENGTH
         LA    R1,J1DBFR           ADDR OF P3G
         TPUT  (1),(0),EDIT,NOWAIT,NOHOLD,BREAKIN,LOWP,           XXXXXX
               USERIDL=J1DJOBN
         MVC   J1DOPER1(L'J1DBFR),J1DBFR
         LA    R1,J1DOPER
         SVC   35
*    WRITE SMF RECORD FOR BEGINNING                                *SKV
         USING JRP4DS,R1                                           *SKV
         L     R1,J1DJRP4D                                         *SKV
         MVI   JRP4STAT,C'R'                                       *SKV
         MVI   JRP4DSRN,X'10'                                      *SKV
         MVI   JRP4DATA+00,X'40'                                   *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+01(39),JRP4DATA                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+00(8),J1DBFR+00                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+09(8),J1DBFR+09                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+18(5),J1DBFR+31                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+24(6),J1DBFR+37                            *SKV
*        LR    R2,R1                                               *SKV
         L     R15,J1DJRP4A                                        *SKV
         BALR  R14,R15                                             *SKV
         DROP  R1                                                  *SKV
P3GNTPUT NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DEOF RESET END-OF-FILE FLAG
         CLI   J1DSEP,C'N'         PAGE SEPERATORS DESIRED?
         BE    P3GNSEP             NO-SKIP IT
         TM    J1DFLAG2,J1DHDR     ARE THERE HEADERS REQUIRED??
         BNO   P3GNSEP             NO-SKIP IT
P3GNDATE DS    0H                  NO PRINT TODAY
         LA    R1,J1DBEG           LINE 1
         LA    R0,L'J1DBEG
         MVC   01(07,R1),=C'*******'                               *SKV
         MVC   08(01,R1),=C' '                                     *SKV
         MVC   09(15,R1),J1DBFR+31        DEVICE NAME              *SKV
         MVC   24(01,R1),=C' '                                     *SKV
         MVC   25(07,R1),=C'*******'                               *SKV
         MVC   32(07,R1),=C' START '                               *SKV
         MVC   39(07,R1),=C'*******'                               *SKV
         MVC   46(01,R1),=C' '                                     *SKV
         MVC   47(09,R1),J1DBFR          JOBNAME                   *SKV
         MVC   56(01,R1),=C' '                                     *SKV
         MVC   57(03,R1),=C'***'                                   *SKV
         MVC   60(01,R1),=C' '                                     *SKV
         MVC   61(08,R1),J1DBFR+9        STC/JOB/TSU NUMBER        *SKV
         MVC   69(01,R1),=C' '                                     *SKV
         MVC   70(07,R1),=C'*******'                               *SKV
*                                                                  *SKV
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'       SP1 AFTER
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         PRINT HEADER
         LA    R1,J1DBEG           LINE 2                          *SKV
         LA    R0,L'J1DBEG                                         *SKV
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'       SP1 AFTER                      *SKV
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         PRINT HEADER                    *SKV
         LA    R1,J1DBEG           LINE 3                          *SKV
         LA    R0,L'J1DBEG                                         *SKV
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'       SP1 AFTER                      *SKV
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         PRINT HEADER                    *SKV
         LA    R1,J1DBEG           LINE 4                          *SKV
         LA    R0,L'J1DBEG                                         *SKV
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'       SP1 AFTER                      *SKV
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         PRINT HEADER                    *SKV
         LA    R1,J1DBEG           LINE 5                          *SKV
         LA    R0,L'J1DBEG                                         *SKV
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'89'       SP1 AFTER                      *SKV
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         PRINT HEADER                    *SKV
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'8B'       SP1 AFTER                      *SKV
P3GNSEP  DS    0H                  SKIP DATASET HEADER
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DNEWDS   SET FLAG TO SUPPRESS 1ST SKIP
         B     P3GET
         TITLE  'LOOP GETTING/WRITING DATA SET UNTIL END'
P3GLOOP  DS    0H
         GET   P3DDCBI
         CLC   J1DMLNE,=F'0'      THIS FIX ALLOWS MLIN TO      JRP0001
         BE    P3KPRNT             BE NULLIFIED BY MLIN=0      JRP0001
         LA    R2,1(R2)
         C     R2,J1DMLNE
         BNH   P3KPRNT
         OI    J1DFLAG2,J1DFLUSH   NO RESET OPNDST FLAG
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DKEEP
         MVC   J1DWHY,=CL10'TERMINATED'
         MVC   J1DBYWHO,=CL8'MAXLINE'
         MVC   J1DOPERM(4),=C'W400'
*
**       GET CARRAGE, LINE LEN., AND LOCATION FOR WRITER.
*
P3KPRNT  LH    R0,DCBLRECL-IHADCB+P3DDCBI GET DEF. LRECL
         TM    DCBRECFM-IHADCB+P3DDCBI,DCBRECU UNDEFINED
         BO    P3GNOTV             YES
         TM    DCBRECFM-IHADCB+P3DDCBI,DCBRECV VARIABLE
         BNO   P3GNOTV             NO
         LH    R0,0(R1)            GET REC LEN
         LA    R1,4(R1)            SKIP RDW
         SH    R0,=H'4'            SKIP RDW LEN.
P3GNOTV  DS    0H
         TM    DCBRECFM-IHADCB+P3DDCBI,X'02' MACH. CARRIAGE
         BNO   P3FRC1SP            NO-TRY ASCII
         MVC   J1DCONCH,0(R1)
P3ADJREG DS    0H
         LA    R1,1(R1)            SKIP CC
         BCTR  R0,0                SKIP CC LEN.
         B     P3PUTIT             SETUP FOR WRITER
P3FRC1SP DS    0H
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'      1SP AFTER
         TM    DCBRECFM-IHADCB+P3DDCBI,X'04' ASCII
         BNO   P3PUTIT             NO CARRIAGE
*
**       BREAK ASCII COMMAND DOWN INTO IMM. AND PRINT
*
         STM   R0,R1,J1DSAV01      SAVE STRT, LEN
         LA    R14,=X'F00B6013F18B'  ASCII XLATE TBL
         LA    R15,3          L' OF TABLE(3 PAIRS)
***********************************************************************
*        IDEA IS TO PRINT ALL W/ 1SP AFTER.
*        NOTE NO SUPPORT FOR '+' - OVERPRINT.
*        SO '0' = (SP 1 IMM)+(PR W/ 1 SP AFTER)
*           '-' = (SP 2 IMM)+(PR W/ 1 SP AFTER)
*           '1' = (SK CH 1 IMM)+(PR W/ 1 SP AFTER)
*           ' ' OR '+' = (PR W/ 1 SP AFTER)
***********************************************************************
P3FRLOC  DS    0H
         CLC   0(1,R14),0(R1)
         BE    P3FRFND             FOUND ASCII ARG. CHAR
         LA    R14,2(R14)          NEXT PAIR
         BCT   R15,P3FRLOC
         B     P3ADJREG            UNKNOWN - FORCE 1 SP
P3FRFND  DS    0H
         MVC   J1DCONCH,1(R14)     MOVE IMMEDIATE PART OF ASCII
         XR    R0,R0               ZERO LENGTH
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         PUT IMMEDIATE PART
         LM    R0,R1,J1DSAV01      RESTORE JRPREGS
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'      1SP AFTER
         B     P3ADJREG            ADJ JRPREGS AROUND CARRIAGE
*
**       NORMAL PUT INTERFACE
*
P3PUTIT  DS    0H
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS
         B     P3GET
P3GCALLW DS    0H                  RE-CALL WTR - USE PREV. R0/R1
         BAL   R14,P3WLOC          GO TO VTAM WRITER
P3GET    DS    0H                  GET NEXT RECORD
         TM    J1DFLAG2,J1DPURGE
         BNO   P3CKSTOP
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(10),=CL10'DRAINING'
P3CKSTOP TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DSTOP    WAS STOP ISSUED DURING VTAM WRITE
         BNO   P3CKFLSH
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP
         B     P3GEOD              YES-SIM. EODAD
P3CKFLSH TM    J1DFLAG2,J1DFLUSH   FLUSH AND PURGE CURR. D.S.
         BNO   P3CKIOER            NO FLUSH - CK FOR I/O ERR
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP
         BNO   P3SYNFL
         MVC   J1DOPERM(4),=C'I402'
         MVC   J1DWHY,=CL10'RESTARTED'
         B     P3FLUSHR
P3SYNFL DS     0H                                               9041
         MVC   J1DOPERM(4),=C'I401'
         MVC   J1DWHY,=CL10'TERMINATED'
P3FLUSHR NI    J1DFLAG2,255-J1DFLUSH
         CLI   J1DHSCS,C'Y'
         BE    *+10
         MVC   P3DBUFR(2),=X'F5C8' RESET WRITE CONTROL CHAR
         LA    R0,L'J1DFLSMS
         LA    R1,J1DFLSMS         FLUSH MESSAGE
         STM   R0,R1,J1DMSGLN
         ST    R11,P3DATACH
         LINK   EP=JRP310,MF=(E,P3DATACH)
         LA    R1,J1DFLSMS         GET FLUSH P3G
         LA    R0,L'J1DFLSMS
* SEND FLUSH MESSAGE TO USER IF APPLICABLE
         TPUT  (1),(0),EDIT,NOWAIT,NOHOLD,BREAKIN,LOWP,           XXXXXX
               USERIDL=J1DJOBN
         MVC   J1DOPER1(L'J1DFLSMS),J1DFLSMS
         LA    R1,J1DOPER          GET FLUSH P3G
         SVC   35
         LA    R1,J1DFLSMS         GET FLUSH P3G
         LA    R0,L'J1DFLSMS
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'89'      CH1 AFTER
         OI    J1DFLAG2,J1DTRUNC   FORCE PHYSICAL WRITE(TRUNC)
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS
         B     P3GECLS             CLOSE OUT
*
**       SYNAD  ROUTINE ON JES INPUT D.S.
*
P3SYN    DS    0H                                               9041
         AP    P3DIOER,=P'1'
         CP    P3DIOER,=P'20'
         BL    P3GLOOP
         MVC   J1DWHY(10),=C'CANCELED'
         MVC   J1DBYWHO,=CL8'IO ERROR'                          9041
*        OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP                 LINE DELETED
         B     P3SYNFL             FLUSH DATASET                9041
*
**       CHECK FOR I/O ERROR
*
P3CKIOER DS    0H
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DIOERR         IO ERR
         BNO   P3GRSET             NO - GET NEXT
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(10),=CL10'RETRYING'
         LH    R1,J1DRETLM         GET CURRENT RETRY LIMIT
         LA    R1,1(R1)            BUMP
         STH   R1,J1DRETLM
         L     R9,J1DRPL
         MVC   P3DWORK+6(1),RPLRTNCD-IFGRPL(R9) RTNCD=
         MVI   P3DWORK+7,X'0C'
         UNPK  J1DBROK1(3),P3DWORK+6(2)
         LA    R14,J1DBROK1
         LA    R15,2
         LA    R6,P3STBL1
         EX    R15,P3STR
         MVI   J1DBROK1+2,C' '
         MVC   P3DWORK+6(1),RPLFDB2-IFGRPL(R9) FDBK2=
         MVI   P3DWORK+7,X'0C'
         UNPK  J1DBROK2(3),P3DWORK+6(2)
         LA    R14,J1DBROK2
         LA    R15,2
         LA    R6,P3STBL1
         EX    R15,P3STR
         MVI   J1DBROK2+2,C' '
         MVC   P3DWORK+3(4),RPLSSEI-IFGRPL(R9) SENSE=
         MVI   P3DWORK+7,X'0C'
         UNPK  J1DBROK3(9),P3DWORK+3(5)
         LA    R14,J1DBROK3
         LA    R15,8
         LA    R6,P3STBL1
         EX    R15,P3STR
         MVI   J1DBROK3+8,C' '
         TM    J1DRETLM+1,X'64'    IS IT AT 100 YET
         BNO   P3WAIT              NO - NO NOTIFY OF OPER
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(10),=CL10'RETRYLM'
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DRTLM    RETRY LIMIT EXCEEDED
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP    SAVE DATA-SET
         MVC   J1DBEGJ(8),BLANKS   CLEAR JOB NUMBER IN HEADER
         XC    J1DRETLM,J1DRETLM   CLEAR COUNTER
         LA    R0,J1DTPUTL         LENGTH
         LA    R1,J1DTPUT          ADDR OF P3G
         STM   R0,R1,J1DMSGLN
         ST    R11,P3DATACH
         LINK   EP=JRP310,MF=(E,P3DATACH)
         LA    R1,J1DCMT2          WTO LIST
         SVC   35
         B     P3GECLS
P3WAIT   DS    0H
         STIMER WAIT,BINTVL==F'2000' WAIT A WHILE (SEC * 100)
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DIOERR
         B     P3GCALLW            RE-TRY WRITE AGAIN
P3GRSET  DS    0H
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DEOF     AT EOF?
         BO    P3GEOD1             YES-RETURN TO CLOSE CODE
         B     P3GLOOP
         TITLE  'END OF DATA SET'
P3GEOD   DS    0H
         OI    J1DFLAG2,J1DTRUNC   FORCE PHYSICAL WRITE
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'8B'      SKIP CH1 IMM.
         LA    R1,J1DCONCH         DUMMY START ADDR
         L     R9,J1DRPL
         LTR   R9,R9
         BZ    P3GEOD1
         OI    RPLRH3-IFGRPL(R9),RPLEB   TELL VTAM END OF BRACKET
         XR    R0,R0               LEN. = ZERO
         BAL   R14,P3WLOCS         SKIP
P3GEOD1  DS    0H                  SECONDARY ENTRY POINT
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DEOF     SET END OF FILE
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DSTOP    STOPPING?
         BO    P3GECLS             YES-DONT CHECK FOR I/O ERROR
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DIOERR   I/O ERROR ON FLUSH
         BO    P3CKIOER            YES-GOTO ERROR RECOVERY CODE
P3GECLS  EQU   *
*
**       CLOSE INPUT DCB AND FREE BUFFER POOL
*
         LA    R15,P3DDCBI
         CLOSE ((R15),DISP),MF=(E,J1DOPENX)
         FREEPOOL P3DDCBI          FREE BUFFER POOL
         MVC   J1DOPERM(4),=C'I403'                                *SKV
         MVC   J1DBFR+18(9),=C'  ENDED  '                          *SKV
P3UNSOL1 DS    0H                                                  *SKV
         LA    R0,L'J1DBFR         LENGTH                          *SKV
         LA    R1,J1DBFR           ADDR OF P3G                     *SKV
         STM   R0,R1,J1DMSGLN                                      *SKV
         ST    R11,P3DATACH                                        *SKV
         LINK   EP=JRP310,MF=(E,P3DATACH)                          *SKV
TPUT1    LA    R0,L'J1DBFR         LENGTH                          *SKV
         LA    R1,J1DBFR           ADDR OF P3G                     *SKV
         TPUT  (1),(0),EDIT,NOWAIT,NOHOLD,BREAKIN,LOWP,           XXXXXX
               USERIDL=J1DJOBN                                     *SKV
         MVC   J1DOPER1(L'J1DBFR),J1DBFR                           *SKV
         LA    R1,J1DOPER                                          *SKV
         SVC   35                                                  *SKV
*    WRITE SMF RECORD FOR TERMINATION                              *SKV
         USING JRP4DS,R1                                           *SKV
         L     R1,J1DJRP4D                                         *SKV
         MVI   JRP4STAT,C'R'                                       *SKV
         MVI   JRP4DSRN,X'11'                                      *SKV
         MVI   JRP4DATA+00,X'40'                                   *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+01(39),JRP4DATA                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+00(8),J1DBFR+00                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+09(8),J1DBFR+09                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+18(5),J1DBFR+31                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+24(6),J1DBFR+37                            *SKV
*        LR    R2,R1                                               *SKV
         L     R15,J1DJRP4A                                        *SKV
         BALR  R14,R15                                             *SKV
         DROP  R1                                                  *SKV
         TITLE  'W A I T  F O R   W O R K  O R  S T O P  W R I T E R '
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DBEGIN
         BNO   JRPRTRN
         L     R9,J1DRPL
         CLSDST RPL=(R9),OPTCD=SYN
***                                                                 ***
*        STOP THE WRITER                                              *
***                                                                 ***
JRPRTRN  DS   0H
         XR    R15,R15
*        RETURN TO CALLER
         JRPRTRN
         TITLE  'V T A M  W R I T E R'
P3WLOCS  DS   0H
         ST    R0,J1DISIZ          L'
         ST    R1,J1DILOC          ADDR
P3WLOC   DS    0H
         ST    R14,J1DWRET         SAVE RETURN
*
**       SUPRESS SKIP IF FIRST FOR D.S.
*
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DNEWDS
         BNO   P3WNNEW             NOT A NEW D.S.
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DNEWDS
         CLI   J1DCONCH,X'8B'      IS 1ST CMD A SKIP CH1?
         BE    P3WRET              YES-SUPRESS IT-HEADER ALREADY AT CH1
         CLI   J1DCONCH,X'89'      CH 1 AFTER
         BNE   P3WNNEW             NO-NORMAL
         MVI   J1DCONCH,X'09'      MAKE 1 SP AFTER
P3WNNEW  DS    0H                  NO SUPRESSION
**       XLATE 328X CTRL/NON-PRINTS OUT
         LM    R0,R1,J1DILOC       GET ADDR,LENGTH OF LINE
         LM    R14,R15,J1DILOC     "
         SH    R15,=H'1'           -1 FOR EXECUTE INSTR
         BM    P3WNOTR             LEN = ZERO - NO XLATE
         LA    R6,P3STBL
         EX    R15,P3STR           XLATE 3270 CTRL CHARS OUT
P3WNOTR  DS    0H
*        MOVE PRINTLINE TO BUFFER
         C     R1,=F'256'          MAX WIDTH (LENGTH OF LINE)
         BL    *+8                 OK
         L     R1,=F'256'          FORCE DOWN TO MAX LENGTH
         L     R14,J1DBFPTR        GET OUTPUT BUFFER NXT AVAL.*
         OC    J1DRETLM,J1DRETLM   IO ERR RETRY?
         BNZ   P3WRETRY            YES-GO TO WRITE
         TM    J1DCONCH,X'02'      IMMEDIATE COMMAND (SPACE ONLY)
         BO    P3WIMM              YES - DONT MOVE DATA
         LR    R15,R1              NOT IMM. MOVE DATA TO BUFFER
         MVCL  R14,R0              R14 WILL POINT AFTER LAST BYTE
P3BKSCAN DS    0H
         BCTR  R14,0               BACK UP ONE BYTE
         CLI   0(R14),C' '         IS IT BLANK
         BE    P3BKSCAN            YES-BACK UP ANOTHER
*              CANT BACK UP OUT OF  BUFFER SINCE WCC IS FIRST BYTE
         LA    R14,1(R14)          R14 POINTS TO NEXT AVALIABLE BYTE
P3WIMM   DS    0H                  IMMEDIATE DATA
         TM    J1DCONCH,X'C0'      SKIP COMMAND
         BNZ   P3SKIP              YES-CALC # LINE FEEDS TO HEAD
P3WSPAC  DS    0H                  CHANGE SPACING TO NL(X'15')S
         IC    R1,J1DCONCH         GET CARRIAGE
         N     R1,=X'00000018'     MASK OFF JUNK
         BNZ   P3ADDSRL            PUT OUT NLS
         LA    R1,1*8              FORCE AT LEAST 1 SP
P3ADDSRL DS    0H
         SRL   R1,3                SHIFT TO GET SPACING
P3ADDLN  DS    0H                  LOOP ADDING NLS TO BUFFER
         L     R0,J1DCURPO         GET CURRENT LINE #
         AR    R0,R1               ADD NEW SPACING
         ST    R0,J1DCURPO         STORE IT
P3ADDNL  DS    0H
         MVI   0(R14),X'15'        NEW LINE CHAR
         LA    R14,1(R14)          NEW OUTPUT ADDR
         BCT   R1,P3ADDNL          LOOP
P3ADDEM  DS    0H
*
**       SEE IF BUFFER FULL YET
*
         ST    R14,J1DBFPTR        SAVE CURR POS.
         TM    J1DFLAG2,J1DTRUNC   FORCE WRITE
         BO    P3WFRC              YES
         LA    R0,P3DBUFR+400       LOAD END OF BUFFER-LEADWAY
         CR    R14,R0               SQUEZE ANOTHER RECORD?
         BL    P3WRET               YES-GET NEXT
P3WFRC   DS    0H
P3WRETRY DS    0H
         CLI   J1DHSCS,C'Y'
         BE    P3WRYSCS
         MVI   0(R14),X'19'        PUT EOM IN
         LA    R14,1(R14)          NEXT BYTE
P3WRYSCS LA    R4,P3DBUFR          GET START
         SR    R14,R4              LENGTH
         LR    R10,R14             LENGTH
         TM    J1DFLAG1,J1DBEGIN
         BO    VTMWRITE          NO  CONTINUE TO PROCESS WRITE
         L     R9,J1DRPL
         CLI   RPLREQ-IFGRPL(R9),RPLOPNDS WAS OPNDST LAST REQ ??
         BE    SIMLOG              YES  CONTROL BLOCKS O.K.
*
**       BUILD DYNAMIC VTAM CONTROL BLOCKS
*
