VTAMDYN  DS    0H
         GENCB AM=VTAM,BLK=NIB,MODE=RECORD,LISTEND=YES,                X
               MF=(G,P3DNIBGN)
         MVC   J1DWERRM(4),=C'E400'
         MVC   J1DWERR1,=CL25'NIB GENCB FAILED'
         LTR   R15,R15
         BNZ   P3FATALF
         LR    R4,R1
         ST    R4,J1DNIB
         SPACE
P3WRPLGN DS    0H
         L     R6,J1DACB
         GENCB AM=VTAM,BLK=RPL,ACB=((R6)),POST=RESP,OPTCD=SYN,         X
               NIB=((R4)),CONTROL=DATA,MF=(G,P3DRPLGN)
         MVC   J1DWERRM(4),=C'E401'
         MVC   J1DWERR1(25),=CL25'RPL GENCB FAILED'
         LTR   R15,R15          CHECK RETURN CODE
         BNZ   P3FATALF         IF NOT ZERO DIE
         LR    R9,R1           LOAD ADDRESS OF RPL IN REG 9
         ST    R9,J1DRPL        SAVE IN FULL WORD AREA
         USING IFGRPL,R9
         CLI   J1DHSCS,C'Y'
         BE    P3RPLSCS
         OI    RPLRH3,P3DBBFLG   BRACKET=(BB,EB) NON SNA
         OI    RPLRH3,P3DEBFLG
         MVC   P3DMDFLG(1),RPLRH3 SET RPL FOR NON SNA BRACKETS
P3RPLSCS MVC   NIBSYM-ISTDNIB(8,R4),P3DLUID
         OI    RPLRH3-IFGRPL(R9),RPLBB
SIMLOG   DS    0H
         CLI   P3DLGMD,C' '
         BNE   P3DACQ
         SIMLOGON RPL=(R9),OPTCD=(SYN,RELRQ,Q)
         LTR    R15,R15
         BNZ    P3RETRY
OPENPRT  DS    0H
         OPNDST RPL=(R9),OPTCD=(SYN,ACCEPT,NQ,SPEC)
         LTR   R15,R15
         BZ    VTMWRITE
         B     P3RETRY
P3DACQ   DS    0H
         MVC   NIBLMODE-ISTDNIB(8,R4),P3DLGMD
         OPNDST RPL=(R9),OPTCD=(SYN,ACQUIRE)
         LTR   R15,R15
         BNZ   P3RETRY
VTMWRITE DS    0H
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DBEGIN OPNDST HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY ISSUED
         L     R9,J1DRPL
         ST    R10,RPLRLEN-IFGRPL(R9)     STORE RECORD LENGTH
         SEND  RPL=(R9),STYPE=REQ,CONTROL=DATA,POST=RESP,              X
               OPTCD=(SYN,CA),AREA=P3DBUFR,                            X
               RESPOND=(NEX,FME,NRRN),CHAIN=ONLY
P3VTAMXX DS    0H
         LTR   R15,R15             SUCCESSFUL
         BNZ   P3RETRY             YES CONTINUE
P3WCKCMP DS    0H
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(10),=CL10'ACTIVE'
         MVC   RPLRH3-IFGRPL(1,R9),P3DMDFLG   RESET BRACKET
         LA    R14,P3DBUFR                    GET BUFFER
         CLI   J1DHSCS,C'Y'                   IS THIS SCS
         BE    P3WSCSY                        YES BRANCH AROUND
         MVC   0(2,R14),=X'F5C8'              MOVE IN BISYNC 3270
         LA    R14,2(R14)          LOCAL CONTROL CHAR BYPASS
P3WSCSY  ST    R14,J1DBFPTR        RESET PTR
         NI    J1DFLAG2,255-J1DTRUNC RESET FORCED WRITE
         XC    J1DRETLM,J1DRETLM   YES - RESET RETRY COUNTER
P3WRET   DS    0H                  RETURN
         L     R14,J1DWRET         "
         BR    R14                 "
P3SKIP   DS    0H                  HANDLE SKIP COMMAND
         CLI   J1DCONCH,X'89'      SKIP CH 1 AFTER
         BE    P3SKIP1             YES
         CLI   J1DCONCH,X'8B'      SKIP CH 1 IMM.
         BE    P3SKIP1             YES
         B     P3WSPAC             FORCE TO SPACING COMMAND
P3SKIP1  DS    0H                  CALC # OF NLS TO TOP OF FORM
         CLI   J1DHSCS,C'Y'        GET CURRENT POS.
         BNE   P3SKIP2             CLEAR
         MVI   0(R14),X'0C'        DIVIDE BY LINES/PAGE
         LA    R14,1(R14)          LINES/PAGE
         B     P3ADDEM             MINUS REMAINDER = # OF NLS
P3SKIP2  DS    0H                  CALC # OF NLS TO TOP OF FORM
         L     R1,J1DCURPO         GET CURRENT POS.
         XR    R0,R0               CLEAR
         D     R0,J1DLEN           DIVIDE BY LINES/PAGE
         L     R1,J1DLEN           LINES/PAGE
         SR    R1,R0                MINUS REMAINDER = # OF NLS
         B     P3ADDLN             INSERT NLS
P3RETRY  DS    0H
P30811   CLC   RPLSSEI-IFGRPL(2,R9),=X'0811'    PRINT CANCEL
         BNE   P30821
         OI    J1DFLAG2,J1DFLUSH   NO RESET OPNDST FLAG
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DKEEP
         MVC   J1DWHY,=CL10'TERMINATED'
         MVC   J1DBYWHO,=CL8'CANCEL'
         B     P3WCKCMP
P30821   CLC   RPLSSEI-IFGRPL(2,R9),=X'0821'   BIND ERROR
         BNE   RETRYCMP
         MVI   J1DRETLM+1,X'64'    IS IT AT 100 YET
RETRYCMP DS    0H
         CLI   RPLREQ-IFGRPL(R9),RPLOPNDS WAS OPNDST LAST REQ ??
         BE    P3RETRYA            YES  NO CLSDST RPL NOT OPENED.
         CLSDST RPL=(R9),OPTCD=(SYN,RELEASE)
         NI    J1DFLAG1,255-J1DBEGIN  TURN OFF OPNDST FLAG
P3RETRYA OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DIOERR   LET CALL DECIDE WHAT TO DO
         B     P3WRET              RETURN(RE-CALL AT TWWLOC TO RETRY)
         TITLE 'CHECK FOR STOP/MODIFY'
P3FATALF DS    0H
         CVD   R15,J1DWORK         CONVERT CALLERS RETURN CODE IN R15
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)     SAVE MY JRPREGS
         UNPK  J1DWERR2,J1DWORK+6(2) 999 MAX RC SUPPORTED
         OI    J1DWERR2+L'J1DWERR2-1,C'0' MAKE PRINTABLE
         LA    R0,L'J1DWERR-4      LENGTH
         LA    R1,J1DWERR+4        ADDR OF P3G
         STM   R0,R1,J1DMSGLN
         ST    R11,P3DATACH
         LINK   EP=JRP310,MF=(E,P3DATACH)
         LA    R1,J1DWERR          GET MF=L FORM OF WTO
         SVC   35                  ISSUE WTO
         MVC   J1DHSTAT(6),=C'ABENDU'
         MVC   J1DHSTAT+6(3),=C'300'
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DRTLM    MUST ISSUE $S
         OI    J1DFLAG1,J1DKEEP    UNALLOCATE AND KEEP DATASET
         MVC   J1DBEGJ(8),BLANKS   CLEAR JOBNUM FOR HEADER
         ABEND  300,DUMP           ABEND USER 300
J2SYN    EQU    *
***********************************************************************
*  EVERYTHING FROM HERE ON IS NOT COPIED TO DYNAMIC AREA              *
***********************************************************************
         TITLE 'LITERAL POOL'
*        JRPSMAC
P3STR    TR    0(*-*,R14),0(R6)    EXECUTED
         DS    0F
*DEFINE DCB AND OPEN AND CLOSE. (EODAD,SYNAD,OPEN AND CLOSE)
BLANKS   DC    CL16' '
         SPACE 2
P3STBL   DC    256C' '
UPCTBL   EQU   P3STBL
         ORG   UPCTBL+C' '
         DC    C' '
*        ORG   UPCTBL+C':'
*        DC    C':.<(+:&&'
         ORG   UPCTBL+X'4A'      *SKV* CHANGED TRANSLATES SO IT WOULD
         DC    X'4A'                   PROPERLY
         ORG   UPCTBL+X'4B'      *SKV* CHANGED TRANSLATES SO IT WOULD
         DC    C'.<(+|'                PROPERLY
         ORG   UPCTBL+X'50'      *SKV* CHANGED TRANSLATES SO IT WOULD
         DC    X'50'                   PROPERLY
         ORG   UPCTBL+C'!'
         DC    C'!$*);¬-/'
         ORG   UPCTBL+C','
         DC    C',%_>?'
         ORG   UPCTBL+C':'
         DC    C':#@''="'
         ORG   UPCTBL+X'81'
         DC    X'81,82,83,84,85,86,87,88,89'
         ORG   UPCTBL+X'91'
         DC    X'91,92,93,94,95,96,97,98,99'
         ORG   UPCTBL+X'A2'
         DC    X'A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9'
         ORG   UPCTBL+C'A'
         DC    C'ABCDEFGHI'
         ORG   UPCTBL+C'J'
         DC    C'JKLMNOPQR'
         ORG   UPCTBL+C'S'
         DC    C'STUVWXYZ'
         ORG   UPCTBL+C'0'
         DC    C'0123456789'
         ORG
P3STBL1  DC    256X'F0'
         ORG   P3STBL1+X'F0'
         DC    X'F0F1F2F3F4F5F6F7F8F9C1C2C3C4C5C6'
         ORG
         LTORG
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC - GOTTEN AREA'
P3SWA    DS    0D
**********************************************************************
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
**********************************************************************
P3SDCBIS EQU   *
P3SDCBI  DCB   DSORG=PS,MACRF=GL,BUFNO=2,EODAD=P3GEOD,SYNAD=P3SYN
P3SDCBIE EQU   *
P3SATACH CALL  ,J2SYN,MF=L
         DS    0F
P3SWERR  WTO   'JRPI405 RXXXXXXX OUTPUT REQUED , RTNCD=XX ,FDBK2=XX  SEX
               NSE=00000000 ',MF=L,ROUTCDE=(8)
P3SMDL   EQU   *-P3SWA
         SPACE 2
         LTORG
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC - GOTTEN AREA'
P3DSA    DSECT
         DS    9D                  O/S SAVE
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
P3DWA    DS    0F
P3DDCBIS EQU   *
P3DDCBI  DCB   DSORG=PS,MACRF=GL,BUFNO=2,EODAD=P3GEOD,SYNAD=P3SYN
P3DDCBIE EQU   *
P3DATACH CALL  ,J2SYN,MF=L
         DS    0F
P3DWERR  WTO   'JRPI405 RXXXXXXX OUTPUT REQUED , RTNCD=XX ,FDBK2=XX  SEX
               NSE=00000000 ',MF=L,ROUTCDE=(8)
***********************************************************************
*  EVERYTHING FROM HERE ON IS SET TO LOW VALUES AT INIT TIME          *
***********************************************************************
         DS    0F                  ALIGN
P3DNIBGN NIB   MODE=RECORD
P3DRPLGN RPL   AM=VTAM
         DS    0F
ST4      DS    F
ST5      DS    F
ST6      DS    F
P3DBUFR  DS    CL768
P3DWORK  DS    D
P3DLUID  DS    CL8
P3DLGMD  DS    CL8
P3DIOER  DS    PL2
P3DMDFLG DS    X
*
P3DCLRE  EQU   *                   END OF DYNAMIC AREA
P3DSASIZ EQU   *-P3DWA             SIZE OF DYNAMIC AREA
P3DBBFLG EQU   X'80'
P3DEBFLG EQU   X'40'
         JRPREGS
*        AIF   ('&TCPIP' EQ 'NO').NOTCPI4                          *SKV
*        COPY  MDCB                                            *DHC*SKV
*.NORCPI4 ANOP                                                     *SKV
         DCBD   DSORG=PS
         IFGRPL AM=VTAM             RPL
         ISTDNIB                     NIB
         JRPDMAC
         JRP4DS                                                    *SKV
         END

JRP310.text:
JRP310 TITLE 'JRP UNSOLICITED MESSAGE PROCESSOR'
***********************************************************************
*                                                                     *
*             MODULE NAME = JRP310                                    *
*                                                                     *
*             DESCRIPTIVE NAME =  UNSOLICITED MESSAGE PROCESSOR       *
*                                 FOR JRP CONTROL TERMINALS           *
*                                                                     *
*             AUTHOR = MIKE SCHORTMAN -                               *
*                                                                     *
*             COPYRIGHT = 1/8/84                                      *
*                                                                     *
*              MODIFIED = *
*                                                                     *
*             STATUS = ONE INVALID MESSAGE ISSUED ON FIRST COMMAND    *
*                      PASS,NOT CRITICAL,WILL BE FIXED.               *
*                                                                     *
*             FUNCTION =                                              *
*                PARSES MVS OPERATOR COMMANDS AND INPUT FROM          *
*                JRP INITIALIZATION DATA SET.                         *
*                                                                     *
*                OPERATION =                                          *
*                   SCAN COMMANDS OR INPUT PASSED BY JRP100           *
*                   FOR JRP KEYWORDS AND MAKES APPROPRIATE            *
*                   MODIFICATIONS TO DYNAMIC PRINTER ENTRY AREAS.     *
*                                                                     *
*              NOTES =                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                 DEPENDENCIES = JRPDMAC AND/OR JRPSMAC MUST NOT      *
*                              BE CHANGED WITHOUT REASSEMBLY.         *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                 REGISTER CONVENTIONS = STANDARD CONVENTIONS.        *
*                    REGISTERS 1 TO 11 = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                    REGISTER  12      = ADDRESSABILITY TO JRP310     *
*                                        CSECT                        *
*                    REGISTER  13      = SAVE AREA REGISTER AND       *
*                                        ADDRESSABILITY TO GETMAINED  *
*                                        WORK AREA                    *
*                    REGISTERS 14,15   = WORK REGISTERS               *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                PROCESSOR = ASM                                      *
*                                                                     *
*                MODULE SIZE = 5K BYTES                               *
*                                                                     *
*                ATTRIBUTES = SCHEDULER KEY 8, PROBLEM STATE          *
*                   PROBLEM PROGRAM STATE                             *
*                                                                     *
*             ENTRY POINTS = JRP310 (ONLY ENTRY POINT)                *
*                                                                     *
*                LINKAGE =                                            *
*                   FROM JRP300 AS A SUBROUTINE                       *
*                                                                     *
*             INPUT = R8 POINTS TO JRPPFLG ,R10 POINTS TO JRP"S       *
*                DYNAMIC PRINTER AREAS,R11 POINTS TO COMMAND OR       *
*                INITIALIZATION INPUT.                                *
*                                                                     *
*             OUTPUT = NONE                                           *
*                                                                     *
*             EXIT - NORMAL = AT PROGRAM END VIA BRANCH REGISTER 14   *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             EXTERNAL REFERENCES =                                   *
*                                                                     *
*                ROUTINES = IKJPARS, DAIRFAIL, GNRLFAIL               *
*                                                                     *
*                DATA AREAS = NONE                                    *
*                                                                     *
*                CONTROL BLOCKS = PWT                                 *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             TABLES = DATA AREA TO BE GETMAINED.  MAPPED BY DSECT    *
*                BEGINNING AT LABEL P1DWA.                            *
*                                                                     *
*             MACROS = JRPSAVE,JRPRTRN,TPUT,                          *
*                                                                     *
*             CHANGE ACTIVITY = NONE                                  *
*                                                                     *
*             MESSAGES =                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                THIS PROGRAM IS THE PROPERTY OF MIKE SCHORTMAN,      *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             ABEND CODES = NONE                                      *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
*                                                                   SKV
         COPY  JRPGLBL                                              SKV
*                                                                   SKV
JRP310 CSECT
         JRPSAVE REG=12,ID=*,LV=P1DSASIZ
         USING P1DSA,R13
         L     R4,0(R1)
         USING J1TWA,R7                   TERMINAL DSECT
         USING J1DWA,R4                   PRINTER  DSECT
*
**       MOVE MODEL DATA TO GOTTEN AREA ZERO REST FOR RENT REUS
*
         LA    R0,P1DWA
         LA    R1,(P1DCLRE-P1DWA)
         LA    R14,P1SWA
         LA    R15,P1SMDL
         MVCL  R0,R14
         L     R11,J1DTWT
*
**       FIND TERMINALS THAT WANT UNSOLICITED MESSAGES AND SEND THEM
*
TABEND   DS    0H
         CLC   0(4,11),=C'PEND'
         BE    JRPRTRN
RETBUSY  L     R7,0(11)
         LTR   R7,R7
         BZ    UNSTBMP
         TM    J1TFLG,J1TUNSOL
         BNO   UNSTBMP
         TM    J1TFLG,J1TBUSY
         BO    TIMER
         OI    J1TFLG,J1TBUSY
         L     R2,J1TRPL
         TM    J1TFLG1,J1TSNA                   ;SNA DEVICE ???
         BNO   MODCB
         L     R5,=X'00010000'
         SEND  RPL=(R2),STYPE=REQ,CONTROL=SIGNAL,SIGDATA=(R5),         X
               OPTCD=(SPEC,SYN)
TESTDIR  TM    J1TFLG,J1TRECD
         BZ    MODCB
         STIMER WAIT,BINTVL==F'100'         WAIT 1 SECOND
         B     TESTDIR
MODCB    MODCB AM=VTAM,RPL=(R2),CHNGDIR=NCMD,CONTROL=DATA
         OI    RPLOPT5-IFGRPL(R2),RPLDLGIN      OPTCD=CS
         NI    RPLOPT1-IFGRPL(R2),255-RPLASY    OPTCD=SYN
         NI    RPLOPT5-IFGRPL(R2),255-RPLNODE   OPTCD=SPEC
         NI    RPLRH3-IFGRPL(R2),255-RPLBB      BRACKET=NBB
         NI    RPLRH3-IFGRPL(R2),255-RPLEB      BRACKET=NEB
         MVI   RPLCHN-IFGRPL(R2),RPLONLY        CHAIN=ONLY
         LM    R5,R6,J1DMSGLN
         BAL   R10,P1TSEND
         B     P1CMOK
UNSTBMP  DS    0H
         LA    R11,4(R11)
         B     TABEND
TIMER    STIMER WAIT,BINTVL==F'100'         WAIT 1 SECONDS
         B     RETBUSY
P1TSEND  DS    0H
         C     R5,J1DCOLS
         BNL   P1CSETMR
         NI    J1TFLG,255-J1TMRMSG
         B     P1CSETNM
P1CSETMR DS    0H
         OI    J1TFLG,J1TMRMSG      MORE MESSAGE
         LR    R15,R6
         A     R15,J1DCOLS           NEW ADDRESS
         LR    R14,R5
         S     R14,J1DCOLM1
         ST    R15,J1TNEWAD
         ST    R14,J1TNEWLN
         LA    R5,J1DCOLM1
P1CSETNM L     R14,J1TADDSV
         LTR   R14,R14
         BZ    TOP
         CLC   6(4,R14),=C'TEND'
         BE    TOP
         CLC   8(4,R14),=C'TEND'
         BNE   NOBUMP
         MVI   J1DAREA2,C' '
         MVC   J1DAREA2+1(78),J1DAREA2
         B     NOBUMP
TOP      DS    0H
         MVI   J1DAREA2,C'-'
         MVC   J1DAREA2+1(78),J1DAREA2
         L     R14,J1DADTBL
NOBUMP   MVC   J1DADD1(2),0(R14)
         MVC   J1DADD2(2),2(R14)
         MVC   J1DAREA1(80),=80C' '
         EX    R5,PRTMVC
         LA    R14,2(R14)
         ST    R14,J1TADDSV
         LA    R5,J1DOUTLN
         LA    R6,J1DOUTBF
         L     R2,J1TRPL
         SEND  RPL=(R2),RECLEN=(R5),AREA=(R6),STYPE=REQ
         LTR   R15,R15
         BNZ   J1FATALF
         TM    J1TFLG,J1TMRMSG     MORE DATA
         BZR   R10
         L     R6,J1TNEWAD
         L     R5,J1TNEWLN
         B     P1TSEND
**********************************************************************
*
**             GIVE OPER STATUS TO MODIFY COMMAND
*
P1CMOK   DS    0H                  GIVE OPER OK P1G
         MVC   J2DMSS(7),=CL7'OK'
P1CMPOK  DS    0H
         LA    R5,L'J2DOK-1
         LA    R6,J2DOK
         L     R2,J1TRPL
         MODCB AM=VTAM,RPL=(R2),CHNGDIR=CMD,OPTCD=CA
*        OI    RPLRH3-IFGRPL(R2),RPLCMD         CHNGDIR=CMD
*        NI    RPLOPT5-IFGRPL(R2),255-RPLDLGIN  OPTCD=CA
         BAL   R10,P1TSEND
         NI    J1TFLG,255-J1TBUSY
         OI    J1TFLG,J1TRECD
         B     UNSTBMP
PRTMVC   MVC   J1DAREA1,0(R6)
J1FATALF EQU   *
JRPRTRN  DS    0H
         DROP  R7
         DROP  R4
         JRPRTRN
         TITLE 'LITERAL POOL'
         LTORG
         TITLE 'STATIC STORAGE'
P1SWA    DS    0D
**********************************************************************
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
**********************************************************************
J2SOK    DC    CL15'JRP100I INVALID'
P1SMDL   EQU   *-P1SWA
         SPACE 2
         TITLE 'DYNAMIC - GOTTEN AREA'
P1DSA    DSECT
         DS    9D                  O/S SAVE
****NOTE NOTE NOTE  MUST KEEP STATIC AND DYNAMIC AREAS IN SYNC***
****DYNAMIC IS GETMAINED AND STATIC IS USED TO INITIALIZE IT.
P1DWA    DS    0D
J2DOK    DC    CL15'JRP100I INVALID'
J2DMSS   EQU   J2DOK+8,7
***********************************************************************
*  EVERYTHING FROM HERE ON IS SET TO LOW VALUES AT INIT TIME          *
***********************************************************************
         DS    0F
P1DCLRE  EQU   *                   END OF DYNAMIC AREA
P1DSASIZ EQU   *-P1DWA             SIZE OF DYNAMIC AREA
         TITLE 'MISC EQUATES AND DSECTS'
         JRPTMAC
         JRPDMAC
         JRPREGS
         IFGRPL AM=VTAM
         PUSH  PRINT
*        PRINT NOGEN               SAVE A LITTLE PAPER
         PRINT ON,GEN
         END

JRP4DS.text:
MACRO
&NAME    JRP4DS
JRP4DS   DSECT
**********************************************************************
*
*     JRP4DS
*
*     DEFINES THE COMMUNICATION MAPPING FOR THE JRP400 STORAGE AREA
*
**********************************************************************
JRP4STAT DS    C             JRP400 RUN MODE
*                            R = RUN
*                            S = STOP/SHUTDOWN
*                              = JRP400 IDLE / AVAILABLE FOR WORK
JRP4DSRN DS    XL1           SUB RECORD NUMBER
*                              = HEX VALUE FROM 00 TO 39
*JRP4IINI DC    XL1'00'        JRP INIT
*JRP4IEND DC    XL1'01'        JRP END
*JRP4ICIC DC    XL1'02'        JRP CONSOLE OPERATOR ISSUED COMMAND
*JRP4ICIP DC    XL1'03'        JRP CONSOLE OPERATOR ISSUED STOP CMD
*JRP4IUSO DC    XL1'05'        JRP USER SIGNON
*JRP4IUSF DC    XL1'06'        JRP USER SIGNOFF
*JRP4IUIS DC    XL1'07'        JRP USER >INVALID< SIGNON
*JRP4IUIC DC    XL1'09'        JRP USER ISSUED COMMAND
*JRP4IDSP DC    XL1'10'        JRP DEVICE START OF PRINT
*JRP4IDEP DC    XL1'11'        JRP DEVICE END OF PRINT
*JRP4IDDE DC    XL1'12'        JRP DEVICE DEVICE ERROR
JRP4DAID DS    CL4           APPLICATION ID
*                              NORMALLY JRP
JRP4DCID DS    CL4           CONSOLE ID
*                              NORMALLY CJRP
JRP4DSMF DS    XL1           SMF ID TO BE USED
*                              DEFAULT 255 / X'FF'
*JRP4DUID DS    CL8           USERID
*JRP4DDID DS    CL8           DEVICE ID
JRP4DATA DS    CL40          RECORD DATA
JRP4EPA  DS    F             JRP400 EPA
         MEND

JRP4SMF.text:
MACRO
&NAME    JRP4SMF
JRP4SMF  DSECT
* ********************************************************************
*
*    JRP4SMF
*    TO MAP THE SMF RECORD CREATED BY JRP400
*    CHANGE LOG:
*      SKV  03/10/07   CREATED
*
* ********************************************************************
SMFBFR   DS    0CL59    OFFSET (CONSTANT LENGTH OF 59 CHARACTERS)
SMFRCDD  DS    0F        0      SMF RECORD AREA
SMFRLEN  DS    XL2       0      RECORD LENGTH
SMFRSEG  DS    XL2       2      SEGMENT LENGTH
SMFRFLG  DS    XL1       4      FLAG BYTE
SMFRRTY  DS    XL1       5      RECORD NUMBER
SMFRTME  DS    XL4       6      TIME IN HUNDREDS OF A SEC
SMFRDTE  DS    PL4      10      DATE 0CYYDDDF
SMFRSID  DS    CL4      14      SYSTEM ID
SMFRSRT  DS    XL1      18      SUB RECORD TYPE
SMFRAPID DS    CL4      19      APPLICATION ID
SMFRTXT  DS    CL40     23      TEXT
SMFBFRX  EQU   *-SMFBFR
         MEND

JRP400.text:
JRP400   START 0
         SPACE 3
* ********************************************************************
*
*     NAME:     JRP400
*     PURPOSE:  TO WRITE SMF RECORDS IN SUPPORT FOR JRP
*     REQUIREMENTS:  MUST BE LINKED WITH AC=1, WITH RENT AND REUS
*
*
* ********************************************************************
*
         COPY  JRPGLBL
*
         SPACE 3
R0       EQU   0             WORK REGISTER
R1       EQU   1             WORK REGISTER
R2       EQU   2
R3       EQU   3
R4       EQU   4
R5       EQU   5
R6       EQU   6
R7       EQU   7
R8       EQU   8
R9       EQU   9
R10      EQU   10
R11      EQU   11
R12      EQU   12            MAPPING REGISTER
R13      EQU   13            SAVE AREA POINTER
R14      EQU   14            RETURN REGISTER
R15      EQU   15            RETURN CODE / CALLING REGISTER
         USING *,R15
         B     AROUND
         DC    CL8'JRP400'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL1' '
         DC    CL8'&SYSTIME'
AROUND   DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)     SAVE CALLERS REGISTERS
         BALR  R12,0               COPY BASE REGISTER
         USING *,R12
         LR    R3,R1               SAVE PARM POINTER
         LR    R4,R1               SAVE PARM POINTER
         LR    R11,R13             SAVE CALLER'S SAP
         GETMAIN R,LV=2048         GET A PAGE OF STRG FOR OUR WORK AREA
         USING WORKAREA,R13
         LR    R13,R1              SET ADDRESS TO OUR WORKAREA
         ST    R11,SAVEAREA+4      SAVE CALLERS SAP
*        L     R4,0(,R3)           GET ADDRESS OF PARM
         ST    R4,PARMADDR         STORE THE PARM ADDRESS
         USING JRP4DS,R4           MAP THE INPUT AREA
         USING JRP4SMF,R9          MAP THE SMF AREA
         LA    R9,SMFSTOR          POINT TO THE SMF RECORD AREA
JRP4STAR DS    0H
         B     SRNINIT              YES - GO STOP
         CLI   JRP4STAT,C'I'       IS THERE A REQUEST TO INIT?
         BE    SRNINIT              YES - GO STOP
         CLI   JRP4STAT,C'S'       IS THERE A REQUEST TO STOP?
         BE    SRNINIT              YES - GO STOP
         CLI   JRP4STAT,C'R'       GOT A RUN REQUEST?
         BE    SRNINIT              GO DO PROCESS IT
         WTO   'JRP401E - INVALID PARAMETER 1'
         ABEND 001,DUMP
         SPACE 3
SRNINIT  DS    0H
*   DO THE FOLLOWING ON RECEIVING A INIT REQUEST
*   (SHOULD ONLY BE DONE ONCE)
*   GET SMF ID
*        WTO   'JRP400I INITIALIZING'
         L     R5,16               POINT TO CVT
         USING CVT,R5              MAP CVT
         L     R6,CVTSMCA          POINT TO SMF AREA
         USING SMCABASE,R6         MAP SMF AREA
         MVC   SID(4),SMCASID      SAVE SYSTEM ID
         DROP  R5
*   INIT THE RECORD
         MVC   SMFRSEG(2),=X'0000'      SET SEGMENT DESCRIPTER
         MVC   SMFRSID(4),SID           SET SYSTEM ID
         MVC   SMFRFLG(1),=X'02'        SET SYSTEM DESCRIPTER
         MVC   SMFRRTY(1),JRP4DSMF      SET RECORD NUMBER - 255
         MVC   SMFRAPID(4),JRP4DAID     SET APPLICATION ID
*        B     EXIT                     DONE - GO EXIT
         SPACE 3
SRNXX    DS    0H
*   GET CURRENT DATE AND TIME
*        WTO   'JRP400I RUNNING     '
         TIME  BIN
         ST    R0,FTIME
         ST    R1,FDATE
*        LA    R11,SMFBFR           POINT TO BUFFER AREA
*        USING SMFRCDD,R11          MAP THE AREA
         SPACE 3
*   BUILD RECORD
         MVI   SMFRTXT,X'40'            PREP TO CLEAR AREA
         MVC   SMFRTXT+1(39),SMFRTXT      AND CLEAR REMAINDER
         MVC   SMFRTME(4),FTIME         SET TIME
         MVC   SMFRDTE(4),FDATE         SET DATE
         MVC   SMFRSRT(1),JRP4DSRN      SET SUB RECORD TYPE
         MVC   SMFRLEN(2),=X'003B'      SET RECORD LENGTH - 59
         MVC   SMFRTXT(40),JRP4DATA     MOVE TEXT
*  TEST IF SUB RECORD TYPE IS INVALID
         CLI   JRP4DSRN,X'00'      IS THE SUB RECORD NUMBER LESS?
         BL    INVSRN               YES - GO DO ERROR
         CLI   JRP4DSRN,X'39'      IS THE SUB RECORD NUMBER GREATER?
         BH    INVSRN               YES - GO DO ERROR
         B     C1                  OK - WE ARE WITHIN RANGE
INVSRN   DS    0H
         WTO   'JRP400E - INVALID CODE RECEIVED. '
         ABEND 041,DUMP
C1       DS    0H
*        MVC   BR+3(1),JRP4DSRN    STORE INDEX INTO REG STRG AREA+3
*        L     R8,BR              LOAD R15 WITH BRANCH INDEX VALUE
*        ABEND 044,DUMP
*        B     RTVT(R8)           BRANCH TO THE ROUTINE
         SPACE 3
WRTRCD   DS    0H
*   WRITE RECORD
*        WTO   'JRP400I: WRITING SMF RECORD...'
         L     R11,=F'0'            SET GOOD RETURN CODE
         SMFWTM SMFBFR              WRITE THE SMF RECORD
         LR    R3,R15               SAVE THE RETURN CODE
         LTR   R15,R15              DID THE WRITE WORK?
         BZ    EXIT                  YES - GO EXIT
         WTO   'JRP400E JRP400 ABENDING'
         ABEND 043,DUMP               TERMINATE THE PROGRAM
J4STOP   DS    0H
*        WTO   'JRP400I: JRP400 ENDING 0 '
*   EXIT PROGRAM
EXIT     DS    0H
*        WTO   'JRP400I: JRP400 ENDING 1 '
         LR    R11,R13              COPY OUR GOTTEN SAVE AREA LOC.
         L     R13,SAVEAREA+4       RELOAD CALLERS SAP
         FREEMAIN R,LV=2048,A=(R11) FREE OUR STORAGE
*        WTO   'JRP400I: JRP400 ENDING '
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)      RELOAD CALLERS REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15              SET PGM RC = 0
         BR    R14                  RETURN TO CALLER
*
***  STATIC AREA - UNCHANGABLE
*
WAITTIME DC    C'00000500'   TIME TO WAIT = 1 SEC. IN HHMMSSTH
         LTORG
*
***  DYNAMIC AREA - CHANGABLE
*
WORKAREA DSECT
SAVEAREA DS    18F
PARMADDR DS    F
BR       DC    F'0'
SID      DC    4CL1' '
FTIME    DC    F'0'
FDATE    DC    F'0'
*
SMFSTOR  DS    CL70
         JRP4SMF
         JRP4DS
         CVT   DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
         IEESMCA
         END

SMF1.text:
*    WRITE SMF RECORD FOR BEGINNING                                *SKV
         USING JRP4DS,R1                                           *SKV
         L     R1,J1DJRP4D                                         *SKV
         MVI   JRP4STAT,C'R'                                       *SKV
         MVI   JRP4DSRN,X'10'                                      *SKV
         MVI   JRP4DATA+00,X'40'                                   *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+01(39),JRP4DATA                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+00(8),J1DBFR+00                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+09(8),J1DBFR+09                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+18(5),J1DBFR+31                            *SKV
         MVC   JRP4DATA+24(6),J1DBFR+37                            *SKV
*        LR    R2,R1                                               *SKV
         L     R15,J1DJRP4A                                        *SKV
         BALR  R14,R15                                             *SKV
         DROP  R1                                                  *SKV

TEST1.text:
1 TOP OF PAGE (1 OF 3)
1 TOP OF PAGE (2 OF 3)
1 TOP OF PAGE (3 OF 3)

T1.text:
*    WRITE SMF RECORD FOR BEGINNING                                *SKV
****     USING JRP4DS,R14                                          *SKV
*        L     R14,J1DJRP4D                                        *SKV
*        MVI   JRP4STAT,C'R'                                       *SKV
*        MVI   JRP4DSRN,X'07'                                      *SKV
*        MVI   JRP4DATA+00,X'40'                                   *SKV
*        MVC   JRP4DATA+01(39),JRP4DATA                            *SKV
*        MVC   JRP4DATA+00(8),J1DUSER                              *SKV
*        MVC   JRP4DATA+09(31),J1DTXT                              *SKV
*        LR    R1,R14                                              *SKV
*        L     R15,J1DJRP4A                                        *SKV
*        BALR  R14,R15                                             *SKV
****     DROP  R14                                                 *SKV

WRTSMF.text:
MACRO
&NAME    WRTSMF BR='R2',                                               *
               SMFRNO='',                                              *
               DSRN=,                                                  *
               DATA='                                        '
         USING &BR,JRP400SX
         L     &BR,
         MVI   JRP4STAT,C'R'           SET TO RUN MODE
         MVI   JRP4DSRN,X'&DSRN'       SET SUB RECORD TYPE
         MVC   JRP4DAID(4),J1DAPPNM    SAVE JRP APPLICATION NAME
         MVC   JRP4DATA(40),=C'&DATA'
         LR    R1,&BR                  SET PARAMETER POINTER ASSRESS
         L     R15,J1DJRP4A            LOAD JRP400 EPA
         BALR  R14,R15                 RUN JRP400
         DROP  &BR
         MEND
